description_en:
**Sunsilk Soft & Smooth Shampoo 190ml** is a gentle, nourishing shampoo that helps keep your hair soft, silky, and smooth. Designed to hydrate and tame unruly hair, providing deep nourishment for soft, manageable hair.  This unique blend of ingredients smooths the hair cuticle, reduces frizz, and restores moisture. Ideal for dry, frizzy, or unmanageable hair, leaving it smooth and shiny without weighing it down.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sunsilk Soft & Smooth Shampoo**
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly with warm water.
â­ Apply a small amount of **Sunsilk Soft & Smooth Shampoo** to your palm and gently massage into your hair and scalp.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water, ensuring all shampoo is removed.
â­ Use **Sunsilk Soft & Smooth Shampoo** conditioner for best results.
â­ Style as desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sunsilk Soft & Smooth Shampoo**
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Glycerin
â­ Fragrance

With **Sunsilk Shampoo Collagen Blends Moisture Bomb 350 ml**, you'll get softer, shinier hair. â­ Rich formula with collagen and hyaluronic acid for deep hydration. â­ Free of sulfates and silicones for gentle hair care. â­ Provides essential moisture and maintains hair health. â­ Restores hair's vitality and natural shine. â­ Suitable for daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sunsilk Shampoo Collagen Blends Moisture Bomb 350 ml**: â­ Apply an appropriate amount of shampoo to wet hair. â­ Gently massage your scalp. â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water. â­ Repeat as needed.

**Sunsilk** Soft & Smooth Cream 200ml is a nourishing hair care product designed to make your hair soft, silky, and manageable. This cream nourishes your hair with a blend of natural ingredients that repair and smooth dry, rough hair, leaving it soft and shiny. It's ideal for daily use, providing long-lasting hydration and protection.

â­ Wash your hair with your preferred **Sunsilk** shampoo.

â­ Style your hair as desired.

description_en:
**Sunsilk Moisture Bomb Mask 220ml** is an intensive hair treatment mask designed to deeply hydrate and nourish dry, dull, and damaged hair. This mask, infused with a blend of moisturizing ingredients, helps restore moisture balance, leaving your hair soft, smooth, and shiny. It provides intense nourishment from root to tip, replenishing dry strands and improving the hair's overall texture. Perfect for those with dry or dehydrated hair, the **Moisture Bomb Mask** works to lock in moisture, control frizz, and revitalize your hair, making it feel healthy, hydrated, and more manageable.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sunsilk Moisture Bomb Mask 220ml**
â­Wet your hair with warm water.
â­Apply an adequate amount of **Sunsilk Moisture Bomb Mask 220ml** to your hair from roots to ends.
â­Leave it for 5-10 minutes.
â­Rinse thoroughly with cool water.
â­Style your hair as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sunsilk Moisture Bomb Mask 220ml**
â­Water
â­Glycerin
â­Panthenol
â­Natural Oils
â­Other Moisturizing Ingredients

**Sunsilk Conditioner Coconut Moisture 340ml** for soft and shiny hair. Experience deep hydration with a rich formula blended with natural coconut oil. **Sunsilk Conditioner Coconut Moisture 340ml** provides essential moisture from roots to tips, protects against daily damage, and leaves hair soft and silky with a long-lasting refreshing scent. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sunsilk Conditioner Coconut Moisture 340ml**: 
â­ Use after shampoo.
â­ Apply to hair ends only, avoiding the roots.
â­ Leave for one minute, then rinse well.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sunsilk Conditioner Coconut Moisture 340ml**:

â­ Refreshing fragrances.

**Sunsilk Honey Anti-Breakage Conditioner 340ml** deeply nourishes and strengthens your hair, leaving it silky smooth and manageable. Infused with the goodness of almond oil and honey, this conditioner provides intense hydration and protection, making your hair 5 times stronger from the first use. Enjoy a captivating fragrance that lasts for 24 hours!

description_en:
**Sunsilk Hair Fall Solution Shampoo - 190ml** is the perfect solution for hair loss. This unique shampoo gently cleanses the scalp and nourishes hair from roots to ends, helping reduce hair fall and stimulate growth. It contains a rich formula of nourishing ingredients that support hair health and enhance its strength, giving you healthy and beautiful hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sunsilk Hair Fall Solution Shampoo - 190ml**: 
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly with water.
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of **Sunsilk Hair Fall Solution Shampoo - 190ml** to your hair and scalp.
â­ Gently massage the shampoo into your scalp and hair in circular motions to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water until all the shampoo is removed.
â­ Repeat if necessary.
â­ Use a suitable conditioner after shampooing for extra nourishment.

description_en:
**Sunsilk Conditioner Thick & Long 340ml** is designed to help you achieve thicker, longer, and more voluminous-looking hair. This nourishing conditioner strengthens hair strands from root to tip, providing essential moisture and protection.  Infused with a unique blend of ingredients, it helps reduce breakage, prevent split ends, and enhance your hair's natural thickness. Ideal for fine or limp hair, it promotes healthy hair growth, making your hair look fuller, thicker, and longer over time.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sunsilk Conditioner Thick & Long 340ml**:
â­ Shampoo your hair first with a suitable shampoo.
â­ Apply a generous amount of **Sunsilk Conditioner Thick & Long 340ml** to damp hair, focusing on the ends.
â­ Leave in for 2-3 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.
â­ Style as desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sunsilk Conditioner Thick & Long 340ml**:
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Cetearyl Alcohol
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5)
â­ Glycerin
â­ Fragrance

**Sunsilk Byebye Hairfall Mask 220ml** is a deep conditioning treatment designed to help reduce hair fall caused by breakage, while strengthening hair for long-term health. This nourishing hair mask is formulated with a blend of vitamins, oils, and strengthening ingredients that target the root of hair fall, helping to fortify hair and improve its resilience. It deeply nourishes and repairs, providing extra care for hair that is prone to breakage or thinning. With regular use, it helps restore hairâ€™s natural strength and shine, reducing hair fall and promoting healthier, fuller-looking hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sunsilk Byebye Hairfall Mask 220ml**
â­ Shampoo your hair with your preferred Sunsilk shampoo.
â­ Apply a generous amount of the mask to damp hair, focusing on the ends.

**Sunsilk Shampoo Collagen Blends Byebye Hairfall**, is constant hair fall affecting your confidence? Weak hair is prone to breakage and hair loss. With **Sunsilk Shampoo Collagen Blends Byebye Hairfall**, you'll achieve strong, beautiful hair. Its advanced formula with a collagen blend strengthens hair and provides high elasticity. You'll notice a significant difference in the strength and resilience of your hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sunsilk Shampoo Collagen Blends Byebye Hairfall**:
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of shampoo to your hands.
â­ Distribute the shampoo evenly throughout your hair.
â­ Gently massage your hair.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water.
â­ Use daily for best results.

â­ Aqua

**Sunsilk Conditioner Collagen Blends Byebye Hairfall 170 ml** is the perfect solution for hair fall problems. Tired of weak and falling hair? With the advanced formula of **Sunsilk Conditioner Collagen Blends Byebye Hairfall 170 ml**, you will get strong, shiny, and healthy hair.

â­ Apply the conditioner to your wet hair after shampooing.

â­ Use daily for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sunsilk Conditioner Collagen Blends Byebye Hairfall 170 ml**:
â­ Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Behentrimonium Chloride, Parfum, Dipropylene Glycol, Glycerin, Amodimethicone, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Disodium EDTA, PEI-45/TMP/Xylene Diisocyanate Crosspolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Cetrimonium Chloride, PEG-7 Propylheptyl Ether, Lactic Acid, Lysine HCl, Caprylyl Glycol, Bentonite, Sodium Polystyrene Sulfonate, Polyquaternium-4, Cellulose Gum, Magnesium Nitrate, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Magnesium Chloride, Methylisothiazolinone, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Ceramide NG, Benzyl Salicylate, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool.

**Sunsilk Conditioner With Jasmine & Green Tea 350 ml** is a luxurious conditioner for dry and damaged hair. â­ Enriched with calcium and keratin to cleanse the scalp and nourish hair. â­ Leaves your hair incredibly soft and shiny. â­ Gentle formula suitable for all hair types. â­ Infused with the refreshing scent of Jasmine and Green Tea.

**Sunsilk Conditioner Micellar Water & Aloe Vera 350 Ml** gently cleanses your hair without stripping away volume, while aloe vera provides light moisturization. Experience bouncy, vibrant hair full of life!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sunsilk Conditioner Micellar Water & Aloe Vera 350 Ml**:
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of **Sunsilk Conditioner Micellar Water & Aloe Vera 350 Ml** to wet hair after shampooing.
â­ Gently massage from roots to ends.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sunsilk Conditioner Micellar Water & Aloe Vera 350 Ml**:
â­ Water â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine â­ Dimethiconol â­ Sodium Chloride â­ Perfume â­ Carbomer â­ Gluconolactone â­ Sodium Hydroxide â­ TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate â­ Citric Acid â­ Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride â­ TEA-Sulfate â­ Amodimethicone â­ Disodium EDTA â­ Adipic Acid â­ Sodium Sulfate â­ Mica â­ Trehalose â­ DMDM Hydantoin â­ Sodium Benzoate â­ Phenoxyethanol â­ PEG-45M â­ Lysine HCl â­ Trideceth-12 â­ Cetrimonium Chloride â­ Hydrolyzed Keratin â­ PPG-9 â­ Panthenol â­ Magnesium Nitrate â­ Dimethyl Palmitamine â­ Methylchloroisothiazolinone â­ Silica â­ BHT â­ Magnesium Chloride â­ Methylisothiazolinone â­ Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate â­ Pantolactone â­ Potassium Sorbate â­ Acetic Acid â­ Hexyl Cinnamal â­ Butylphenyl Methylpropional â­ Linalool â­ Benzyl Salicylate â­ Citronellol â­ Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone â­ CI 77891

description_en:
**Sunsilk Hair Cream Ginseng & Soya 175 Ml** is the perfect solution for hair fall! **Sunsilk Hair Cream Ginseng & Soya 175 Ml** deeply nourishes your hair from roots to tips, making it strong and healthy, reducing hair fall by up to 10 times.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sunsilk Hair Cream Ginseng & Soya 175 Ml**:
â­ Before showering, massage your dry hair with the cream from roots to tips.
â­ After showering, apply a small amount to your wet hair for easy styling and added shine.
â­ For best results, use it with **Sunsilk** shampoo and conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sunsilk Hair Cream Ginseng & Soya 175 Ml**:
â­ Water
â­ Paraffinum Liquidum
â­ Ceteareth-6
â­ Triethanolamine
â­ Stearyl Alcohol
â­ Carbomer
â­ Trideceth-12
â­ Perfume
â­ Methylparaben
â­ DMDM Hydantoin
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate
â­ Propylparaben
â­ Lysine HCl
â­ Opuntia Ficus-Indica Flower Extract
â­ Propylene Glycol
â­ Sorbitol
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Sodium Hydroxide
â­ Ethylparaben
â­ Potassium Sorbate
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Caramel
â­ Tocopherol
â­ Hydrolyzed Soy Protein
â­ Panax Ginseng Root Extract
â­ Ethoxydiglycol
â­ Butylene Glycol
â­ Lactic Acid
â­ Glucose
â­ Panthenol
â­ Hexyl Cinnamal
â­ Limonene
â­ Butylphenyl Methylpropional
â­ Linalool
â­ Benzyl Salicylate
â­ Benzyl Alcohol.

**Sunsilk Hair Cream Dream Soft & Smooth Egg 175 ml**, say goodbye to coarse and dry hair! This creamy formula enriched with argan oil and babassu oil, seamlessly locks in the moisturized feel of your hair, gently cleanses the roughest hair, giving your hair a silky look and amazing soft feel.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sunsilk Hair Cream Dream Soft & Smooth Egg 175 ml**:
â­ Apply a small amount to your palms.
â­ Gently massage onto your scalp and spread evenly through your hair.
â­ For best results, use with **Sunsilk** shampoo and conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sunsilk Hair Cream Dream Soft & Smooth Egg 175 ml**:
â­ Water
â­ Mineral Oil
â­ Stearyl Alcohol
â­ Carbomer
â­ Triethanolamine
â­ Ceteareth-6
â­ Trideceth-12
â­ Perfume
â­ Methylparaben
â­ DMDM Hydantoin
â­ Tocopheyl Acetate
â­ Propylparaben
â­ Egg Yolk Powder
â­ Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil
â­ Hexyl Cinnamal
â­ Butylphenyl Methylpropional
â­ Limonene
â­ Linalool
â­ Benzyl Salicylate
â­ Citronellol
â­ Coumarin
â­ Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone
â­ Eugenol

description_en:
**SVR Sebia Clear Creme Hydratante 40 ml** is a soothing and repairing moisturizer for acne-prone and dehydrated skin. More than just a moisturizer, it helps repair the skin and fights blemishes and the appearance of red and brown marks. Its non-greasy texture absorbs easily, leaving a comfortable velvety finish. Excellent makeup base.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **SVR Sebia Clear Creme Hydratante 40 ml**:
â­ Apply morning and/or evening to cleansed skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **SVR Sebia Clear Creme Hydratante 40 ml**:
â­ 5% Niacinamide: Soothes, reduces inflammation, and diminishes brown and red marks.
â­ Ceramides: Restores the skin's protective barrier, ensures immediate and long-lasting hydration.
â­ Prebiotic Sugar: Soothes, repairs the skin barrier, moisturizes the skin, and maintains the skin's microbiota.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid: Promotes skin repair and protects against dehydration.

#SVR #Sebiaclearcreme #Moisturizer #Skincare #Acne #Beauty #NaturalIngredients #HealthySkin #SaudiArabia #KSA

description_en:
**SVR Spirial Extreme Roll-On - 20ml** is the ultimate solution for extreme sweating.  This SVR innovation provides long-lasting, effective protection against perspiration caused by stress, humidity, exercise, or medication. Its formula is gentle on the skin, even sensitive skin. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **SVR Spirial Extreme Roll-On - 20ml**:
â­ ATTACK PHASE: Apply 1 to 2 applications to the affected area for 3 consecutive days, morning or evening, on clean, dry skin. Wait a few seconds before dressing.
â­ MAINTENANCE PHASE: Then, apply 1 to 2 applications 2-3 times a week, as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **SVR Spirial Extreme Roll-On - 20ml**:
â­ Aluminium chloride + aluminium sesquichlorohydrate: to control intense sweating.
â­ Antibacterial agent: prevents the formation of unpleasant odours.
â­ Niacinamide: protects and soothes the skin.

#Deodorant #SVR #SpirialExtreme #BodyCare #RollOn #ExcessiveSweating #Beauty #Skincare #Health #KSA

description_en:
**SVR Cicavit+ Cream 40 Ml** is a fast-absorbing soothing cream that helps accelerate the repair and healing of irritated skin. Ideal for treating wounds, burns, diaper rash, chickenpox marks, post-laser irritation, sunburns, and hair removal irritations. Suitable for face and body.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **SVR Cicavit+ Cream 40 Ml**:
â­ Apply to affected areas twice daily until fully healed.
â­ Use on clean, dry skin.
â­ For external use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **SVR Cicavit+ Cream 40 Ml**:
â­ Contains Erasyl (accelerates wound healing, reduces inflammation).
â­ Contains Teflose (prevents adhesion of harmful bacteria, reduces redness).
â­ Contains prebiotic ingredients (promote beneficial bacteria, eliminate harmful bacteria).

description_en:
**SVR Filler Biotic Eye & Lip Contour Filling & Lifting Cream - 15ml** is a comprehensive treatment for the delicate eye and lip contour area, specifically designed to address wrinkles and expression lines.  It offers a dual action, filling fine lines and firming the skin for a more youthful appearance. Its innovative formula combines purified probiotics, hyaluronic acid, and stabilized Vitamin C to nourish and regenerate the skin. Its lightweight texture absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy feeling. Suitable for all skin types, even sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **SVR Filler Biotic Eye & Lip Contour Filling & Lifting Cream - 15ml**:
â­ Apply a small amount to the eye and lip contour area.
â­ Gently massage until absorbed.
â­ Use morning and evening.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **SVR Filler Biotic Eye & Lip Contour Filling & Lifting Cream - 15ml**:
â­ Purified Probiotics
â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ Stabilized Vitamin C
â­ Other effective ingredients

**SVR Ampule A Lift** Serum is a powerful Vitamin A (Retinol) serum designed to revitalize your skin. â­Improves uneven skin texture. â­Reduces the appearance of enlarged pores. â­Minimizes wrinkles and fine lines. â­Smooths and refines skin quality. â­Visible results in 7 days. â­Suitable for normal and oily skin. â­Soap-free. â­Tested under the supervision of gynecologists.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **SVR Ampule A Lift**: â­Apply morning or night before your usual moisturizer, or mix directly into your cream. â­Avoid contact with eyes. â­Start using every 3 days, then gradually increase frequency depending on your skin's tolerance. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **SVR Ampule A Lift**: â­Retinol (Vitamin A) and other active ingredients.

description_en:
**SVR Sebiaclear [AZ] Ampoule Flash Anti-Blemishes - 30ml** is a concentrated serum designed to target acne blemishes and reduce inflammation.  It quickly reduces the appearance of blemishes and redness, preventing the appearance of scars and dark spots. It regulates excess oil production, reducing shine. Suitable for daily use, morning and night, its light texture absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy feeling. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **SVR Sebiaclear [AZ] Ampoule Flash Anti-Blemishes - 30ml**: 
â­ Apply an appropriate amount to clean, dry skin.
â­ Use morning and night.
â­ Can be used alone or under moisturizer.
â­ Avoid the eye area.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **SVR Sebiaclear [AZ] Ampoule Flash Anti-Blemishes - 30ml**: 
â­ Azelaic Acid: Reduces inflammation, prevents bacterial growth, and reduces melanin production.
â­ Niacinamide: Soothes skin and protects the skin barrier.
â­ Moisturizing ingredients: Maintain skin hydration.

description_en:
**SVR Cleanser Gel 200ml** is a purifying and exfoliating soap-free cleanser, ideal for oily and sensitive skin. This gel transforms into a soft, creamy foam that deeply cleanses your skin without drying it out. It removes impurities and excess oil, leaving your skin fresh, radiant, and matte. Its formula is alcohol-free and paraben-free, and safe for use from age 10 and up.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **SVR Cleanser Gel 200ml**: 
â­ Apply the gel to damp skin.
â­ Gently massage until a lather forms.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Use morning and evening for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **SVR Cleanser Gel 200ml**: 
â­ Soap-free
â­ Paraben-free
â­ Alcohol-free
â­ Oil-free
â­ Suitable for combination and sensitive skin

description_en:
**SVR Baume Palpebral Anti-Itching Soothe Repair Balm** - This soothing and repairing eye balm is specially designed to relieve itching, redness, and irritation in the delicate eye area. It provides deep hydration and protects the skin from dryness and external factors. Its gentle, fragrance-free formula is ideal for sensitive skin prone to eczema and eyelid inflammation. It helps reduce itching, redness, and swelling caused by allergies and strengthens the skin's natural barrier.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **SVR Baume Palpebral Anti-Itching Soothe Repair Balm**: 
â­ Apply a small amount of balm to the eye area and eyelids, gently massaging.
â­ Can be used as a mask in case of severe redness and irritation.
â­ Use daily as part of your skincare routine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **SVR Baume Palpebral Anti-Itching Soothe Repair Balm**: 
â­ Ceramides: Strengthen the skin's natural barrier and maintain moisture.
â­ Niacinamide: Soothes the skin and reduces inflammation.
â­ Shea Butter: Deeply moisturizes and nourishes the skin.

#skincare #moisturizer #soothing #protection #svr #beauty #skin #eye #allergy #facials

**SVR Topialyse Baume Intensif 200 ml** is a rich and effective balm specifically designed for very dry and sensitive skin. â­Instantly relieves itching and soothes the skin. â­Repairs cracked skin and protects it from external pollutants. â­Features a rich formula with Omega 3, 6, and 9, as well as moisturizing and soothing Niacinamide. â­Contains 98% natural ingredients. â­Light on the skin and leaves no greasy residue. â­Suitable for the whole family. â­Fragrance-free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **SVR Topialyse Baume Intensif 200 ml**: 
â­Use daily as needed. 
â­Apply an appropriate amount to dry or itchy areas. 
â­Gently massage until fully absorbed. 
â­For external use only. 
â­If irritation occurs, consult your doctor.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **SVR Topialyse Baume Intensif 200 ml**: 
â­Omega 3, 6, and 9 
â­Niacinamide 
â­98% Natural Ingredients

**SVR - Sebia Clear Cicapeel 15 ml** is the ultimate rescue remedy for blemish-prone skin. This 24-hour active targeted anti-spot gel dries out and eliminates blemishes while preventing the formation of residual blemishes. Its invisible gel texture lasts all day long. Thanks to SVR laboratory's innovative technology, this product combines a unique blend of active ingredients for effective action on all skin types. â­ Paraben-Free â­ Oil-Free â­ Hypoallergenic â­ Alcohol-Free â­ Non-Comedogenic. **SVR - Sebia Clear Cicapeel 15 ml** is perfect for sensitive and acne-prone skin. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **SVR - Sebia Clear Cicapeel 15 ml**: â­ Apply locally two or more times a day. â­ Its invisible texture makes it suitable for use under makeup. â­ Avoid contact with eyes. â­ For external use only.

**SVR Extreme Sun Secure SPF50+ Ultra-Matt Gel** is a high-protection sunscreen formulated to provide broad-spectrum UVA/UVB protection. Its ultra-matte finish helps reduce shine and oiliness, making it perfect for oily or combination skin.  Water-resistant, it ensures long-lasting protection even during sports or swimming. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **SVR Extreme Sun Secure SPF50+ Ultra-Matt Gel**: 
â­ Apply generously to clean, dry skin at least 20 minutes before sun exposure. 
â­ Reapply every two hours, or after swimming, sweating, or toweling off. 
â­ Use enough to cover all exposed skin. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **SVR Extreme Sun Secure SPF50+ Ultra-Matt Gel**: 
â­ Broad-spectrum UVA/UVB filters. 
â­ Moisturizing and soothing ingredients.

**SVR Clairial Night Peel 50 Ml** is a gentle yet effective night peel that corrects dark spots and restores radiance to the skin. Suitable for all skin types, even sensitive skin.  Use to reduce the appearance of brown spots caused by aging, uneven skin tone, and sun exposure. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **SVR Clairial Night Peel 50 Ml**: 
â­ In the evening, apply a thin layer of **SVR Clairial Night Peel 50 Ml** to your face. 
â­ Leave on overnight. 
â­ Can be used once a week with a thick layer for a stronger peel. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **SVR Clairial Night Peel 50 Ml**: (Full ingredient list is available on the packaging)
â­ [Ingredient list will be added here] 

From the first night, you'll notice clearer, more radiant skin. Night after night, dark spots become less visible, and skin becomes more even and radiant. Suitable for adults. #svr #clairial #nightpeel #skinbrightening #darkspots #skincare #beauty #skincareroutine #healthyskin #beautifulskin

description_en:
**SVR Clairial Anti Spot Sun Protection Creme SPF50+ 50 Ml** is the perfect cream to protect your skin from harmful sun rays and prevent the appearance of dark spots. This cream is a 2-in-1 dual-action treatment that combines high sun protection with anti-spot action.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **SVR Clairial Anti Spot Sun Protection Creme SPF50+ 50 Ml**:
â­ Apply evenly in sufficient quantities before sun exposure to the face, neck, and hands.
â­ Reapply frequently, especially after swimming or sweating.
â­ It is advisable to avoid sun exposure between 12 and 4 p.m.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **SVR Clairial Anti Spot Sun Protection Creme SPF50+ 50 Ml**:
â­ [Ingredient list will be added here]

**SVR Clairial Anti Spot Sun Protection Creme SPF50+ 50 Ml** is suitable for all skin types, even sensitive skin, and helps correct brown spots caused by sun, aging, pregnancy, or uneven skin tone. Effective protection against UVA, UVB rays, and visible light.

description_en:
**S-26 Gold Baby Milk Stage (3) 800g** is a complete and nutritious formula for your toddler's crucial 1-3 years growth stage. â­ Supports your child's brain and body development. â­ Advanced, balanced formula tailored to your child's nutritional needs. â­ Easy to prepare and use. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **S-26 Gold Baby Milk Stage (3) 800g**: 
â­ Wash your hands before preparing the formula. â­ Boil water for 5 minutes and let it cool. â­ Use only the enclosed scoop. â­ Add the recommended amount of water and powder. â­ Shake the bottle well until the powder dissolves completely. â­ Consume within one hour of preparation. â­ Store the tin in a cool and dry place. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **S-26 Gold Baby Milk Stage (3) 800g**: 
â­ Skimmed milk, lactose, vegetable oils, whey protein, fructo-oligosaccharides, docosahexaenoic acid, emulsifier (soy lecithin), minerals, and vitamins. (For a complete list, please refer to the packaging).

**S-26 Gold Goat Baby Milk (3) 380g** is a specially formulated baby milk designed to meet your child's nutritional needs, in line with nutritional recommendations for children aged 1-3 years.  It is based on goat's milk and produced in Switzerland.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **S-26 Gold Goat Baby Milk (3) 380g**:
â­ Wash your hands before preparing the milk.
â­ Wash the bottle, teat, and cap thoroughly.
â­ Boil water for 5 minutes, then let it cool.
â­ Add water to the bottle according to the instructions.
â­ Use only the included scoop.
â­ Add powder according to instructions and shake well.
â­ Consume the milk within one hour of preparation.
â­ Store the can in a cool, dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **S-26 Gold Goat Baby Milk (3) 380g**:
â­ Demineralized Whey (from Goatâ€™s Milk)
â­ Vegetable Oils
â­ Milk Powder (from Goatâ€™s Milk)
â­ Lactose
â­ Emulsifier (Soy Lecithin)
â­ Docosahexaenoic Acid (from Tuna Fish)

â­ Nucleotides

â­ Acidity Regulator
â­ Various Minerals and Vitamins

description_en:
**S-26 Gold Baby Milk Ultima (3) 400 Gm** is the perfect solution for nourishing your baby from one year and up. Specifically designed to meet your baby's changing needs at every stage of growth. It contains partially hydrolyzed protein suitable for children with a family history of cow's milk allergy or suspected to develop an allergy.  Not to be used as treatment for cow's milk protein allergy or in case of galactosemia.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **S-26 Gold Baby Milk Ultima (3) 400 Gm**:
â­ Wash your hands before preparing.
â­ Boil water for 5 minutes, then let it cool.
â­ Use only the enclosed scoop.
â­ Add powder to water and stir until completely dissolved.
â­ Consume milk within one hour of preparation.
â­ Store the tin in a cool and dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **S-26 Gold Baby Milk Ultima (3) 400 Gm**:
â­ Lactose
â­ Vegetable Oils
â­ Maltodextrin
â­ Whey Protein
â­ Docosahexaenoic Acid
â­ Emulsifier
â­ Multiple Vitamins and Minerals
â­ Contains Milk, Soy & Fish.

**S-26 Gold Goat Baby Milk (2) 380g** is a specially formulated infant milk designed to meet the nutritional needs of babies aged 6-12 months. Made with goat's milk and produced in Switzerland.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **S-26 Gold Goat Baby Milk (2) 380g**:
â­ Wash your hands before preparing.
â­ Wash bottle, teat and cap thoroughly.
â­ Boil water for 5 minutes, then allow to cool.
â­ Use the enclosed scoop, and add the recommended amount according to the baby's age.
â­ Shake the bottle well until the powder is dissolved.
â­ Consume the milk within one hour of preparation.
â­ Store the tin in a cool, dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **S-26 Gold Goat Baby Milk (2) 380g**:
â­ Demineralized Whey (from Goatâ€™s Milk)
â­ Vegetable Oils
â­ Milk Powder (from Goatâ€™s Milk)

â­ Various Minerals and Vitamins.

description_en:
**S-26 Gold Baby Milk Ultima (1) 400 Gm** is the perfect choice for nourishing your baby during the crucial first six months.  Specially formulated to meet your baby's evolving nutritional needs at every growth stage. It contains partially hydrolyzed protein, making it ideal for infants with a family history of cow's milk allergy or suspected cow's milk allergy. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **S-26 Gold Baby Milk Ultima (1) 400 Gm**:
â­ Wash your hands before preparing the formula.
â­ Wash the bottle, teat, and cap thoroughly.
â­ Boil water for 5 minutes and let it cool.
â­ Add water to the bottle according to the feeding chart.
â­ Use only the enclosed scoop.
â­ Add the specified amount of powder.
â­ Shake the bottle well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Formula should be consumed within one hour of preparation.
â­ Store the tin in a cool and dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **S-26 Gold Baby Milk Ultima (1) 400 Gm**:
â­ Lactose
â­ Maltodextrin
â­ Vegetable Oils
â­ Whey Protein
â­ Docosahexaenoic Acid
â­ Emulsifier (Soy Lecithin)
â­ And multiple vitamins and minerals.

**Note:** Consult your doctor before using the product or changing your baby's feeding regimen.

description_en:
**S-26 Gold Baby Milk LF 400 gm** is a complete and balanced nutritional formula for infants, providing the nutrition of standard formula without lactose (milk sugar). It supports healthy growth and development and can be used with solid foods as part of a lactose-free weaning diet.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **S-26 Gold Baby Milk LF 400 gm**:
â­ Wash your hands before preparing your baby's formula.
â­ Wash bottle or cup, teat and cap thoroughly until no milk remains.
â­ Boil for five minutes. Leave covered until use.
â­ Boil drinking water for five minutes; allow to cool.
â­ Consult feeding table, pour exact amount of lukewarm water into the bottle or cup.
â­ Use only the scoop from this container. Powder must be leveled.
â­ Consult feeding table, add exact number of level scoops.
â­ Stir contents of cup or shake capped bottle well until formula is fully dissolved.
â­ Close can tightly after each use and store in a cool and dry place. Must be used within 4 weeks after opening.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **S-26 Gold Baby Milk LF 400 gm**:
â­ High Oleic Sunflower Oil
â­ Coconut Oil
â­ Whey Protein Concentrate (from cowâ€™s milk)
â­ Milk Protein Isolate
â­ Emulsifier (Soy Lecithin)
â­ Arachidonic Acid
â­ Docosahexaenoic acid (DHA)
â­ Taurine
â­ Nucleotides
â­ L-Carnitine
â­ Antioxidants (Mixed Tocopherol Concentrate, Palm Olein)

#S26Gold #BabyMilk #LactoseFree #InfantNutrition #HealthyGrowth #Baby #ChildHealth #Motherhood #KSA #SaudiArabia

title_ar: **Ø¥Ø³26 Ø¬ÙˆÙ„Ø¯ Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ (Ù…Ø¶Ø§Ø¯ Ù„Ù„Ø£Ø±ØªØ¬Ø§Ø¹) 400 Ø¬Ù…**
description_en:
**S-26 Gold Baby Milk AR 400 gm** is specially formulated to manage mild to moderate regurgitation.  It features a starch-thickened formula to increase viscosity and help reduce reflux.  **S-26 Gold Baby Milk AR 400 gm** is gluten-free and rich in essential nutrients for your baby's growth, including vitamins, minerals, and proteins.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **S-26 Gold Baby Milk AR 400 gm**:
â­ Wash your hands before preparing the formula.
â­ Wash the bottle and nipple thoroughly.
â­ Boil water for 5 minutes and let it cool.
â­ Add water to the bottle according to the feeding chart.
â­ Add the specified amount of powder.
â­ Mix well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Store the can in a cool and dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **S-26 Gold Baby Milk AR 400 gm**:
â­ Starch-thickened formula.
â­ Gluten-free.
â­ Vitamins (A, C, D, E, K).
â­ Minerals (Iron, Iodine, Calcium, Zinc, Selenium).
â­ Proteins.
â­ Oligogalactose and Oligofructose.
â­ Bifidus cultures.

description_en:
**S-26 Gold Baby Milk Pdf 400 gm** is a special formula designed for premature infants after hospital discharge.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **S-26 Gold Baby Milk Pdf 400 gm**:
â­ Wash your hands before preparing your baby's formula.
â­ Wash the bottle or cup, teat, and cap thoroughly to remove any leftover formula.
â­ Boil for five minutes. Leave covered until use.
â­ Boil drinking water for five minutes; allow to cool.
â­ Using the feeding table as a guide, pour the exact amount of lukewarm water into the bottle or cup. Use only the scoop included in the container.
â­ Add the exact number of level scoops as indicated on the feeding table.
â­ Stir until the powder is fully dissolved.
â­ Close the can tightly after each use and store in a cool and dry place. Use within 4 weeks of opening.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **S-26 Gold Baby Milk Pdf 400 gm**:
â­ Palm oil
â­ Medium chain triglycerides
â­ Long-chain polyunsaturated fatty acids
â­ Skimmed milk powder
â­ Corn syrup solids
â­ Lactose
â­ Whey protein concentrate
â­ Emulsifier
â­ Acidity regulator
â­ Taurine
â­ Nucleotides
â­ L-Carnitine

description_en:
**The Breath Co. Mild Mint Rinse 500ml** for long-lasting fresh breath. â­Provides up to 12 hours of fresh breath. â­Maintains oral pH balance. â­Prevents allergies and enamel erosion. â­Works instantly to eliminate bad breath. â­Helps relieve dry mouth. â­Free of alcohol, colors, artificial flavors, and added sugar. â­Non-burning. â­Halal. â­Approved by the American Dental Association. â­Best-selling mouthwash in the USA.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **The Breath Co. Mild Mint Rinse**: â­Rinse your mouth thoroughly with water. â­Use 20ml of **The Breath Co. Mild Mint Rinse** twice daily. â­Swish for at least 30 seconds. â­Do not swallow.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **The Breath Co. Mild Mint Rinse**: â­Water, â­Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, â­Menthol, â­Natural Flavors, â­Other Ingredients.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vichy 48 Hours Anti Perspirant Deodorant for Sensitive Skin 50ml**:

description_en:
**Vichy Normaderm Phytosolution Intensive Purifying Gel for Oily & Acne Prone Skin 200ml** is a daily gel cleanser that purifies and revitalizes the appearance of oily, blemish-prone skin. â­ Perfectly removes impurities including dirt, dust, and pollutant particles. â­ Skin feels cleansed and is left looking fresher, clearer, and mattified. â­ In just one month, blackheads appear less prominent and pores look unclogged. â­ Enriched with actives including BHA Salicylic Acid and Zinc Gluconate in a cleansing base from plant origin. â­ Clinically proven efficacy on excess oil.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vichy Normaderm Phytosolution Intensive Purifying Gel for Oily & Acne Prone Skin 200ml**:
â­ Using one to two pumps, massage into a wet face. Apply morning and evening. â­ Wash product off thoroughly with warm water. â­ For best results, follow with Normaderm Phytosolution Double-Correction Daily Care moisturizer.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vichy Normaderm Phytosolution Intensive Purifying Gel for Oily & Acne Prone Skin 200ml**:
â­ BHA Salicylic Acid: An active ingredient for the treatment of acne; helps control acne blemishes. â­ Zinc Gluconate: Zinc visibly reduces excess oil. â­ Vichy Mineralizing Water: Contains 15 minerals to help strengthen the skinâ€™s moisture barrier; helps protect skin against external exposome aggressors like pollution, stress, and fatigue.

**Vichy Dercos Densi-Solutions Hair Thickening Shampoo for Weak and Thinning Hair 250ml** is the perfect solution for women struggling with thinning hair and lack of volume. This unique shampoo contains Rhamnose and Filloxane, working together to cleanse the scalp of impurities and revitalize hair follicles from the roots, giving your hair the strength and thickness it needs. Enjoy healthy, thick hair with **Vichy Dercos Densi-Solutions Shampoo**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vichy Dercos Densi-Solutions Hair Thickening Shampoo for Weak and Thinning Hair 250ml**:
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of shampoo to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage the scalp.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly with water.
â­ Repeat as needed.
â­ In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vichy Dercos Densi-Solutions Hair Thickening Shampoo for Weak and Thinning Hair 250ml**:
â­ Rhamnose
â­ Filloxane
â­ Other active ingredients to boost hair density.

**Vichy Normaderm Phytosolution** is a daily double-action moisturiser for oily, blemish-prone skin. This lightweight cream is easily absorbed, targets imperfections, revitalizes, and hydrates for up to 24 hours.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vichy Normaderm Phytosolution**:
â­ For best results, wash your face with Vichy Normaderm cleanser first.
â­ Apply morning and evening to cleansed skin.
â­ Avoid the eye contour area.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vichy Normaderm Phytosolution**:
â­ Natural origin salicylic acid (extracted from wintergreen plant leaves; keratolytic action: purifies in depth).

â­ Probiotic-derived Bifidus (strengthens skin barrier function).

description_en:
**Vichy Liftactiv B3 Serum** effectively targets dark spots and wrinkles.  It combats dark spots caused by daily aggressors like pollution. Its innovative formula clinically reduces the appearance of dark spots and wrinkles in just 8 weeks! Suitable for all skin tones, it's fragrance-free and dermatologist-tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vichy Liftactiv B3 Serum**: 
â­ Use after cleansing and before moisturizer.
â­ Use twice daily.
â­ Turn upside down and squeeze the base to dispense.
â­ Apply several drops to a clean, dry face.
â­ Wear under an SPF during the day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vichy Liftactiv B3 Serum**: (Ingredients will be added here later)

â­ Visibly fades dark spots.
â­ Reduces the look of wrinkles.
â­ Evens skin tone.
â­ Suitable for all skin tones.
â­ Fragrance-free, allergy-tested, & dermatologist-tested.

**Vichy Deo 72h Invisible Resist Men 50ml** provides long-lasting, effective sweat protection for up to 72 hours.  It strengthens the skin barrier and protects against stains.  Specifically formulated for sensitive skin, this deodorant is alcohol-free (0% alcohol), hypoallergenic, and boasts an invisible finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vichy Deo 72h Invisible Resist Men 50ml**:
â­ Apply daily to clean, dry underarms.

description_en:

**Vichy Liftactiv Collagen Specialist Eye Care Cream Anti-Ageing 15ml** is a luxurious cream specially designed for the delicate eye area. â­ Reduces the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. â­ Diminishes dark circles and puffiness. â­ Firms and deeply hydrates the skin. â­ Its rich formula with collagen and other active ingredients works to rejuvenate skin cells and noticeably improve its appearance.

description_en:
**Vichy Capital Soleil UV-Age** is an advanced facial sunscreen offering high SPF 50+ protection against harmful UV rays and pollution. Its unique fluid formula is enriched with Niacinamide, Peptides, and Vitamin E, along with patented NetlockÂ® technology, to: â­ Protect against signs of aging, â­ Correct wrinkles and dark spots, â­ Strengthen the skin's defensive barrier. Suitable for all skin types, it boasts an invisible finish, lightweight texture, and easy absorption. Use daily as part of your skincare routine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vichy Capital Soleil UV-Age**: â­ Apply liberally to face and neck before sun exposure. â­ Reapply every two hours, or after swimming or sweating. â­ Suitable for daily use.

title_ar: **ÙÙŠØ´ÙŠ Ù„ÙŠÙØª Ø§ÙƒØªÙŠÙ Ø±ÙŠØªÙŠÙ†ÙˆÙ„ Ø³ÙŠØ±ÙˆÙ… 30 Ù…Ù„**
description_en:
**Vichy Liftactiv Retinol Specialist 30 ml** is a powerful serum containing 0.2% Pure Retinol to reduce wrinkles, even deep ones. It firms and smooths the skin, reduces dark spots and improves radiance. Dermatologist-tested, it contains peptides, prebiotic ferment, and is fragrance-free. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vichy Liftactiv Retinol Specialist 30 ml**:
â­ Apply several drops to a clean, dry face in the evening before your moisturizer.
â­ Avoid contact with the eye area.
â­ Week 1: Apply 2 nights a week.
â­ Week 2: Use every other night.
â­ Week 3: Use nightly as tolerated.  If discomfort persists, space out applications and/or reduce the quantity.
â­ Always make sure to thoroughly moisturize your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vichy Liftactiv Retinol Specialist 30 ml**:
â­ Aqua / Water / Eau
â­ Glycerin
â­ Pentylene Glycol
â­ Isononyl Isononanoate
â­ Alcohol Denat.
â­ Dicaprylyl Ether
â­ Glycine Soja Oil / Soybean Oil
â­ Propylene Glycol
â­ Peg-6 Caprylic/Capric Glycerides
â­ Hydrolyzed Rice Protein
â­ Hydroxyacetophenone
â­ Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7
â­ Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1
â­ Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate
â­ Sodium Hyaluronate
â­ Sodium Hydroxide
â­ Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate
â­ Vitreoscilla Ferment
â­ Retinol
â­ Dicaprylyl Carbonate
â­ Ammonium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate
â­ Butylene Glycol
â­ Caprylyl Glycol
â­ Carbomer
â­ Glyceryl Isostearate
â­ Polysorbate 20
â­ Ppg-6-Decyltetradeceth-30
â­ Sodium Lactate
â­ Tocopherol
â­ Xanthan Gum

description_en:
**Vichy Dercos Aminexil Clinical 5** is a comprehensive anti-hair loss treatment designed specifically for women. â­ Targets five key actions to stop hair fall and stimulate new hair growth. â­ Ideal for women experiencing recurrent or chronic hair loss. â­ Enriched with Aminexil, a clinically proven anti-hair loss ingredient, and five other active components. â­ Increases scalp resistance and strengthens hair, leaving it thicker and more resilient. â­ Hypoallergenic and tested on sensitive scalps.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vichy Dercos Aminexil Clinical 5**: 
â­ Use daily for 21 days for intensive treatment, or three times a week for preventative care. â­ Apply to dry or wet hair. â­ Gently massage to enhance absorption of active ingredients. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vichy Dercos Aminexil Clinical 5**: 
â­ Aminexil â­ Arginine â­ SP94 â­ Vitamins PP/B6 â­ Vichy Mineralizing Thermal Water

description_en:
**Vichy Capital Soleil UV-Age Daily Tinted Anti-Ageing Fluid SPF 50+ with Niacinamide 40 ml** is an advanced face sunscreen with high protection. â­ Its fluid formula provides superior coverage, shielding your skin from the damaging effects of UVA and UVB rays and pollution. â­ It targets signs of aging, such as wrinkles and dark spots. â­ Strengthens the skinâ€™s protective barrier function. â­ Suitable for all skin types, with an invisible finish. â­ Dermatologically tested, hypoallergenic, and non-comedogenic. â­ Clinically proven effectiveness on dark spot pigmentation.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vichy Capital Soleil UV-Age Daily Tinted Anti-Ageing Fluid SPF 50+ with Niacinamide 40 ml**: 
â­ Apply 5-6 pumps to your face and neck using upward strokes. â­ Use daily as the last step in your skincare routine. â­ Spread evenly around the eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vichy Capital Soleil UV-Age Daily Tinted Anti-Ageing Fluid SPF 50+ with Niacinamide 40 ml**: 
â­AQUA /WATER - ALCOHOL DENAT. - DIISOPROPYL SEBACATE - SILICA - ISOPROPYL MYRISTATE - ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE - ETHYLHEXYL TRIAZONE - BIS-ETHYLHEXYLOXYPHENOL METHOXYPHENYL TRIAZINE - BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE - GLYCERIN - CI 77891 / TITANIUM DIOXIDE - PROPANEDIOL - C12-22 - ALKYL ACRYLATE/HYDROXYETHYLACRYLATE COPOLYMER - NIACINAMIDE - DROMETRIZOLE TRISILOXANE - PERLITE - TOCOPHEROL - CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE - TEREPHTHALYLIDENE DICAMPHOR SULFONIC ACID - CI 77492 / IRON OXIDES - CAPRYLYL GLYCOL - PENTYLENE - GLYCOL - TRIETHANOLAMINE - HYDROLYZED RICE PROTEIN - CI 77491 / IRON OXIDES - TRISODIUM ETHYLENEDIAMINE - DISUCCINATE - SILICA SILYLATE - ACRYLATES / C10-30 - ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER - BUTYLENE GLYCOL - CI 77499 / IRON OXIDES - HYDROXYETHYLCELLULOSE - VITREOSCILLA FERMENT - DISODIUM EDTA - PARFUM / - FRAGRANCE

description_en:
**Vichy Dercos Shampoo Oil Control 200ml**, designed to combat over-active sebum production and scalp discomfort. Vichy's exclusive anti-sebum complex has a purifying gel texture, with a light aromatic, marine and mint fragrance for an uplifting cleansing experience. **Vichy Dercos Shampoo Oil Control 200ml** combines four carefully balanced and selected surfactants so the scalp is left feeling cleansed, and oil levels are corrected during the day. Hair feels lighter and easier to style.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vichy Dercos Shampoo Oil Control 200ml**:
â­ Apply on wet hair and scalp.
â­ Leave it on for 1 minute.
â­ Massage the scalp.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Complete your anti-oiliness hair care protocol with the Oil correct conditioner & the Oil correct scalp serum.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vichy Dercos Shampoo Oil Control 200ml**:
â­ AQUA / WATER / EAU
â­ HYDROXYPROPYL STARCH PHOSPHATE
â­ QUATERNIUM-87
â­ STEARYL ALCOHOL
â­ BEHENTRIMONIUM CHLORIDE
â­ ACETIC ACID
â­ AMODIMETHICONE
â­ BIOSACCHARIDE GUM-4
â­ CANDELILLA CERA / CANDELILLA WAX / CIRE DE CANDELILLA
â­ CAPRYLYL GLYCOL
â­ CHLORHEXIDINE DIGLUCONATE
â­ GLYCERIN
â­ ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL
â­ 2-OLEAMIDO-1,3-OCTADECANEDIOL
â­ PHENOXYETHANOL
â­ PROPYLENE GLYCOL
â­ SILICA
â­ SILYLATE
â­ TRIDECETH-10
â­ TRIDECETH-5
â­ ZINC PCA
â­ PARFUM / FRAGRANCE

description_en:
**Vichy Capital Soleil Fluid Invisible Protection SPF 50 Spray 200 ml** is a lightweight, invisible finish sunscreen spray for face and body, ideal for sensitive skin. It's enriched with Hyaluronic acid, Vichy Volcanic water, and probiotic fractions. It provides very high broad-spectrum UVA and UVB protection, with Netlock Technology for easy application and resistance to sweat, sand, and water.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vichy Capital Soleil Fluid Invisible Protection SPF 50 Spray 200 ml**:
â­ Spray generously onto face and body before sun exposure.
â­ Spread evenly for complete coverage.
â­ Reapply frequently, especially after swimming or sweating.
â­ Minimize direct sun exposure.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vichy Capital Soleil Fluid Invisible Protection SPF 50 Spray 200 ml**:
â­ Aqua / Water / Eau
â­ Alcohol Denat.
â­ Ethylhexyl Salicylate
â­ Ethylhexyl Triazone
â­ Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane
â­ and other active ingredients.

#Vichy #Sunscreen #VichyCapitalSoleil #SunProtection #SPF50 #HealthySkin #SkinCare #Beauty #VichyProducts #SaudiArabia

**Vichy Mineral 89 Probiotic Fractions Regenerating and Repairing Serum With Niacinamide 30ml** is your regenerative superdose for stressed skin.  Its high-potency formula, rich in probiotics and antioxidant vitamins, is clinically proven to repair and regenerate skin against visible signs of aging, such as dullness, fine lines, loss of elasticity, and sensitivity.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vichy Mineral 89 Probiotic Fractions Regenerating and Repairing Serum With Niacinamide 30ml**:
â­ Apply 2-3 drops to the face.
â­ Use morning and evening to revitalize and refresh skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vichy Mineral 89 Probiotic Fractions Regenerating and Repairing Serum With Niacinamide 30ml**:
â­ Probiotic Fractions
â­ Vichy Volcanic Water
â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ Niacinamide

description_en:
**Vichy Dercos Oil Control Shampoo 200ml** is a new shampoo from Vichy to control scalp oil production. It thoroughly cleanses the scalp for instantly softer, lighter hair that's easier to style. **Vichy Dercos Oil Control Shampoo 200ml** is designed to combat over-active sebum production and scalp discomfort. Vichy's exclusive anti-sebum complex has a purifying gel texture, with a light aromatic, marine and mint fragrance for an uplifting cleansing experience. Tested under dermatological control.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vichy Dercos Oil Control Shampoo 200ml**:
â­ Apply to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage to avoid over-stimulating the scalp's sebaceous glands.
â­ Rinse. This shampoo can be used daily.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vichy Dercos Oil Control Shampoo 200ml**:
â­ Exclusive anti-sebum complex.
â­ Purifying gel texture.
â­ Light, refreshing aromatic fragrance.
â­ Vichy Mineralizing Thermal Water.
â­ No paraben, No silicone.
â­ Enriched with a UV filter.

description_en:
**Vichy Normaderm 3 in 1 Cleanser, Scrub & Mask for Oily/Acne Skin with salicylic & glycolic acid 125ml** is the perfect solution for oily and acne-prone skin. Its unique formula combines 25% Kaolin clay, Salicylic Acid, Glycolic Acid, Zinc, Pumice, and 5% Vichy Mineralizing Thermal Water. This 3-in-1 cleanser acts as an exfoliator, cleansing cream, and mask to deeply purify the skin and remove impurities and excess oil. â­Unclogs pores. â­Reduces the appearance of acne and blackheads. â­Reduces shine and increases skin radiance. â­Suitable for sensitive skin. â­Paraben-free and mineral oil-free. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vichy Normaderm 3 in 1 Cleanser, Scrub & Mask for Oily/Acne Skin with salicylic & glycolic acid 125ml**: 
â­ Apply a thin layer to the face, avoiding the eye and mouth area. 
â­ Leave on for 5 minutes. 
â­ Rinse with warm water using circular movements. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vichy Normaderm 3 in 1 Cleanser, Scrub & Mask for Oily/Acne Skin with salicylic & glycolic acid 125ml**: 
â­ Kaolin Clay: Purifies and absorbs oils. 
â­ Salicylic Acid: Removes impurities and oils. 
â­ Glycolic Acid: Gently exfoliates and has antibacterial properties. 
â­ Zinc: Regulates sebum production and has antimicrobial properties. 
â­ Pumice: Natural exfoliant. 
â­ Vichy Mineralizing Thermal Water: Rebalances, strengthens, and regenerates the skin. 

#vichy #normaderm #skincleanser #exfoliator #mask #oilyskin #acne #skincare #beauty #skincareroutine

title_ar: **ÙÙŠØ´ÙŠ Ù„ÙŠÙØª Ø£ÙƒØªÙŠÙ Ø§Ù…Ø¨ÙˆÙ„Ø§Øª Ø¬Ù„Ø§ÙŠÙƒÙˆ Ø³ÙŠ** Ù…Ø¹ Ø­Ù…Ø¶ Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ù„ÙŠÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠÙƒ ÙˆÙÙŠØªØ§Ù…ÙŠÙ† Ø³ÙŠ x30 Ø§Ù…Ø¨ÙˆÙ„Ø§Øª
description_en:
**Vichy Liftactiv Glycolic Acid Peel Ampoule**, an anti-aging innovation that targets different types of hyperpigmentation (dark spots, age spots & acne marks). Each protective ampoule glass brings just the right daily dose to your skin.

â­ Clinically proven efficacy. Fragrance free.
â­ Clinically proven to effectively reduce dark spots, age spots & acne marks, even out skin tone and reignite skin radiance.
â­ The 1st medical gesture from pharmacy loaded with dermatological actives of natural origin.
â­ Powerful monodoses with minimalist formulation.
â­ Contains Vichy volcanic water, 10% glycolic acid complex, Vitamin C, and Hyaluronic Acid.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vichy Liftactiv Glycolic Acid Peel Ampoule**: 
â­ Step 1: Gently tap on the top of the ampoule to push the product down.
â­ Step 2: Carefully crack the ampoule open and secure the plastic applicator.
â­ Step 3: Apply 1/2 the ampoule in the evening and massage into the skin.
â­ Step 4: Use the plastic tip to close the applicator.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vichy Liftactiv Glycolic Acid Peel Ampoule**: 
â­ 10% GLYCOLIC ACID COMPLEX: Brightens & exfoliates, diminishes dark spots.
â­ VITAMIN C: Diminishes dark spots, restores skin radiance and corrects hyperpigmentation.
â­ VICHY VOLCANIC WATER: Strengthens the natural defenses of the skin, rich in 15 essential minerals.
â­ HYALURONIC ACID: Reduces insensitive water loss, recharges the epidermis' daily hyaluronic acid loss.

#Vichy #Skincare #Brightening #Beauty #HealthySkin #Radiance #VitaminC #GlycolicAcid #Ampoules #SkincareRoutine

**Vichy Roll On Homme** 50ml (2+1 free) is the perfect choice for men with sensitive skin seeking effective, long-lasting protection against perspiration. description_en:
**Vichy Dercos Anti Dandruff Shampoo for Normal to Oily hair 390 ml** effectively eliminates visible dandruff. Suitable for daily use, this lightweight shampoo provides anti-dandruff protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vichy Dercos Anti Dandruff Shampoo for Normal to Oily hair 390 ml**:
â­ For the first application, leave on the hair for 2 minutes, then rinse thoroughly.
â­ For subsequent washes, massage into hair, then rinse.
â­ Use as a 4-week program.
â­ In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vichy Dercos Anti Dandruff Shampoo for Normal to Oily hair 390 ml**:
â­ AQUA / WATER

**Vichy Dercos Energy + Stimulating Anti-Hair Loss Shampoo with Aminexil 390ml** is the perfect solution for weak and falling hair. This unique shampoo provides a rich experience, activating the scalp and stimulating hair growth. It contains effective ingredients, including Aminexil, known for its effectiveness in combating hair loss.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vichy Dercos Energy + Stimulating Anti-Hair Loss Shampoo with Aminexil 390ml**: 
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly.
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of **Vichy Dercos Energy + Stimulating Anti-Hair Loss Shampoo with Aminexil 390ml** to your scalp.
â­ Gently massage your scalp in circular motions.
â­ Leave the shampoo on your hair for a few minutes.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vichy Dercos Energy + Stimulating Anti-Hair Loss Shampoo with Aminexil 390ml**: 
â­ Aminexil
â­ Other active ingredients to stimulate hair growth.

description_en:
**Vichy Dercos Anti Dandruff Shampoo for Dry Hair 390 ml** is the perfect shampoo to eliminate dandruff and itching. Suitable for daily use, this lightweight shampoo works to eliminate visible dandruff, providing anti-dandruff protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vichy Dercos Anti Dandruff Shampoo for Dry Hair 390 ml**: 
â­ For the first application, leave on the hair for 2 minutes, then rinse thoroughly.
â­ For subsequent washes, massage into hair, then rinse.
â­ Use as a 4-week program.
â­ In case of contact with eyes, rinse them immediately.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vichy Dercos Anti Dandruff Shampoo for Dry Hair 390 ml**:
â­ AQUA / WATER
â­ SODIUM LAURETH SULFATE
â­ GLYCOL DISTEARATE
â­ DIMETHICONE
â­ COCO-BETAINE
â­ GLYCERIN
â­ CARBOMER
â­ CI 19140 / YELLOW 5
â­ CITRIC ACID
â­ MENTHOL
â­ 2-OLEAMIDO-1,3-OCTADECANEDIOL
â­ PPG-5-CETETH-20
â­ SALICYLIC ACID
â­ SELENIUM SULFIDE
â­ SODIUM BENZOATE
â­ SODIUM CHLORIDE
â­ SODIUM HYDROXIDE
â­ TOCOPHERYL ACETATE
â­ PARFUM / FRAGRANCE

description_en:
**Vichy Ideal Soleil Velvety Sunscreen SPF50+ 50ml (1+1) Kit**: High UV protection SPF 50+ that hydrates the skin. Combats premature ageing and the damaging effects caused by UV rays using MexorylÂ®, a UVA and UVB filtering system. Skin feels smoother and wrinkles are reduced.  **Vichy Ideal Soleil Velvety Sunscreen SPF50+** helps protect the skin against the harmful effects of the sun. It has a silky smooth texture that melts into the skin. The skin appears smoother, softer, and supple. â­ High UV Protection â­ Combats Premature Ageing â­ Silky Smooth Texture â­ Suitable for Sensitive Skin

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vichy Ideal Soleil Velvety Sunscreen SPF50+ 50ml (1+1) Kit**:
â­ Apply the sunscreen product just before exposure.
â­ Re-apply frequently and generously to maintain protection, especially after swimming, perspiring or towelling.
â­ Use sunscreen products that offer sufficient protection for your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vichy Ideal Soleil Velvety Sunscreen SPF50+ 50ml (1+1) Kit**:
â­ Vichy Mineralizing Thermal Water â­ French Volcanic Water from the Auvergne Region â­ Supercharged with 15 Essential Minerals â­ Clinically Proven to Strengthen Skin's Natural Defenses, Hydrate & Soothe Skin

description_en:
**Vitafos** is a complete and balanced nutritional formula for children aged 1-10 years, specially designed to meet their diverse nutritional needs. It is rich in proteins, vitamins, minerals, and fiber to promote healthy growth and development.  **Vitafos** features a delicious vanilla flavor, making it easy to use and digest. With regular use, **Vitafos** contributes to strengthening the immune system and protecting the child from diseases. The **Vitafos** formula is gluten-free and suitable for children with lactose intolerance. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vitafos**: 
â­ Add 4 tablespoons of **Vitafos** powder to 160ml of warm water. 
â­ Stir well until completely dissolved. 
â­ Can be added to drinks, soups, or desserts. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vitafos**: 
â­ Maltodextrin, Vegetable oils, Whey protein, Vitamins (A, B, C, D, E, K), Minerals, Fructooligosaccharides, Natural flavor (Vanilla), Animal Fat, Sucrose, Antioxidants. 

#Vitafos #babyformula #babyfood #childhealth #healthygrowth #vitamins #minerals #immunity #KSA #SaudiArabia

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vitafos Nutritional Milk From 3year 2x400g - Pack Of Two**: 
â­To prepare one serving (200ml), add 4 scoops of **Vitafos Nutritional Milk From 3year 2x400g - Pack Of Two** to 160ml of warm water. â­Stir well until completely dissolved.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vitafos Nutritional Milk From 3year 2x400g - Pack Of Two**: â­Maltodextrin, â­Whey protein, â­Vegetable oils, â­Sucrose, â­Medium chain triglycerides, â­Fructooligosaccharides, â­Mineral salts, â­Animal fat (Fish oil), â­Emulsifier, â­Choline chloride, â­Vitamins, â­Lactic ferments, â­Inositol, â­Vanilla flavour, â­L-carnitine, â­Antioxidants.

**OGX Hair Oil Argan Penetrating Oil 100ml** is a luxurious hair oil enriched with Moroccan argan oil, deeply nourishing and restoring your hair's health and shine. Its unique formula penetrates easily into the hair strands, leaving them glossy and silky soft. **OGX Hair Oil Argan Penetrating Oil 100ml** strengthens hair and protects it from heat and UV damage. Discover the secret to healthy, radiant hair with **OGX Hair Oil Argan Penetrating Oil 100ml**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **OGX Hair Oil Argan Penetrating Oil 100ml**:
â­ Pour a small amount into your palms. 
â­ Rub your palms together to distribute the oil evenly. 
â­ Apply the oil to clean, towel-dried hair from roots to ends. 
â­ Do not rinse. 
â­ Style as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **OGX Hair Oil Argan Penetrating Oil 100ml**:
â­ Moroccan Argan Oil. 
â­ Nourishing hair ingredients. 
â­ Paraben-free. 
â­ Sulfate-free.

description_en:
**Ogx Thick & Full Biotin & Collagen Conditioner 385 Ml** is an exclusive blend of Vitamin B7 biotin, collagen and hydrolysed wheat protein that helps thicken and texturize any hair type with just one use. A powerful sulfate-free formula, **Ogx Thick & Full Biotin & Collagen Conditioner 385 Ml** helps volumize even the skinniest strands to create an appearance of thicker, fuller and healthier looking hair. **Ogx Thick & Full Biotin & Collagen Conditioner 385 Ml**, beauty pure and simple!

â­ Powerful, exclusive blend of Vitamin B7 biotin, collagen and hydrolysed wheat protein
â­ Creates thicker, fuller and healthier looking hair
â­ Helps volumize even the skinniest strands
â­ No parabens
â­ Sulfate free surfactants

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Ogx Thick & Full Biotin & Collagen Conditioner 385 Ml**:
â­ After shampooing, apply conditioner generously to wet hair, working through to ends.
â­ Wait 3-5 minutes, then rinse hair thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Ogx Thick & Full Biotin & Collagen Conditioner 385 Ml**:
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Cetyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Dimethicone, Biotin, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Ethyltrimonium Chloride Methacrylate/Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein Copolymer, Panthenol, Ethyl Trisiloxane, Glycol Distearate, Glycol Stearate, Ceteareth-20, Isopropyl Alcohol, Citric Acid, Disodium EDTA, Tetrasodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Parfum/Fragrance, Hexyl Cinnamal, CI 60730/Ext. Violet 2, CI 17200/Red 33

â­ After shampooing, apply conditioner to your hair from roots to ends.

â­ Aqua/Water/Eau

**Ogx Brazilian Keratin Therapy Shampoo 385 Ml** is a luxurious shampoo designed to give your hair incredible smoothness and shine.  It features a unique blend of coconut oil, keratin proteins, avocado oil, and cocoa butter, which help to strengthen, soften, and improve the overall health of your hair. Its powerful, sulfate-free formula helps to smooth the hair cuticle, leaving you with strong, glossy tresses. Try **Ogx Brazilian Keratin Therapy Shampoo 385 Ml** today and experience the difference of soft, strong, and shiny hair.

â­ Apply a generous amount of shampoo to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage into a lather.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly with water.
â­ Follow with conditioner for best results.

â­Water

â­and other effective natural ingredients.

description_en:
**OGX Conditioner Anti-Breakage Keratin Oil 385ml** is a rich conditioner formulated with keratin proteins and argan oil to fight hair breakage and split ends caused by brushing and styling.  This powerful conditioner helps strengthen each strand from within, protecting against breakage and leaving your hair longer, stronger, and more beautiful. **OGX Conditioner Anti-Breakage Keratin Oil 385ml** is paraben-free and contains sulfate-free surfactants. Experience the beauty of your hair with **OGX Conditioner Anti-Breakage Keratin Oil 385ml**!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **OGX Conditioner Anti-Breakage Keratin Oil 385ml**:
â­ After shampooing, apply conditioner generously to wet hair, working through to ends.
â­ Wait 3-5 minutes, then rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **OGX Conditioner Anti-Breakage Keratin Oil 385ml**:
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Cetearyl Alcohol
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Behentrimonium Chloride
â­ Cetyl Alcohol
â­ Hydrolyzed Keratin
â­ Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil
â­ Dimethiconol
â­ Polyquaternium-37
â­ Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate
â­ PPG-1 Trideceth-6
â­ Isopropyl Alcohol
â­ Citric Acid
â­ DMDM Hydantoin
â­ Methylchloroisothiazolinone
â­ Methylisothiazolinone
â­ Magnesium Chloride
â­ Magnesium Nitrate
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)
â­ Yellow 5 (CI 19140)
â­ Yellow 6 (CI 15895)
â­ Blue 1 (CI 42090)

#OGX #haircare #keratin #conditioner #healthyhair #beauty #hairproducts #hairfall #naturalingredients #KSA #SaudiArabia

description_en:
**Ogx Extra Strength Argan Oil of Morocco Hair Mask 300ml** gives your hair a luxurious upgrade with this super creamy hair mask. Its extra powerful formula, enriched with Argan oil of Morocco, helps to intensely hydrate, lock in moisture, and repair your hair. Thanks to Argan oil of Morocco and silk proteins, this creamy blend helps detangle, delivering superior hydration and added inner strength. Give your hair a second chance at silky perfection! Saturate your hair in a powerful blend with **Ogx Extra Strength Argan Oil of Morocco Hair Mask 300ml**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Ogx Extra Strength Argan Oil of Morocco Hair Mask 300ml**:
â­ Apply to damp hair, focusing on ends.
â­ Apply to dry hair in moderation for additional hydration and smoothing benefits.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Ogx Extra Strength Argan Oil of Morocco Hair Mask 300ml**:
â­Water (Aqua) â­Behentrimonium Chloride â­Cetyl Alcohol â­Cetearyl Alcohol â­Glycerin â­PPG Benzyl Ether Myristate â­Steareth â­Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil â­Cocodimonium Hydroxypropyl Silk Amino Acids â­Amodimethicone â­Polyquaternium â­Polyquaternium-10 â­Trideceth-6 â­Propylene Glycol â­Dicaprylate/Dicaprate â­Glycol Distearate â­Isopropyl Alcohol â­Citric Acid â­Sodium Hydroxide â­Disodium EDTA â­Sodium Benzoate â­Fragrance (Parfum)

Infused with Apple Cider Vinegar, it gently removes impurities, product buildup, and excess oil, leaving your hair fresh, clean, and shiny. It also relieves dandruff and itchy scalp. **Ogx Shampoo Apple Cider Vinegar 385ml** is the perfect choice for nourishing your hair and scalp.

â­ Apply a generous amount of shampoo to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage into a rich lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Follow with **Ogx** conditioner for best results.

â­ Aqua/Water/Eau

â­ Vinegar Extract

â­ and other effective natural ingredients.

description_en:
**Ogx Conditioner Apple Cider Vinegar 385ml** is a moisturizing conditioner enriched with apple cider vinegar, specially designed to add shine and a silky touch to your hair. This conditioner enhances moisture, maintains balance, and leaves your hair looking healthy and radiant.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Ogx Conditioner Apple Cider Vinegar 385ml**:
â­ After shampooing, apply the conditioner to wet hair from mid-shaft to ends.
â­ Leave for 3-5 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Ogx Conditioner Apple Cider Vinegar 385ml**:
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Behentrimonium Chloride, Catearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Amodimethicone, Steareth-20, Vinegar Extract, Polyquarternium-47, Polyquarternium-37, PPG-3 Benzyl Ether Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, PPG-1 Trideceth-6, Acrylates/Stearyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Sorbitan Oleate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Benzoate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxybydrocinnamate, Parfum/Fragrance, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Benzyl Salicyate

description_en:
**OGX Conditioner Hydration Coconut Water 385ml** is an ultra-lightweight, hydrating conditioner perfect for dry, parched hair. Enriched with coconut water, electrolytes, and coconut oil, it deeply nourishes and replenishes your hair, leaving it silky, shiny, and healthy.  It's sulfate-free and paraben-free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **OGX Conditioner Hydration Coconut Water 385ml**:
â­ After shampooing, apply conditioner generously to wet hair, working through from roots to ends.
â­ Wait 3-5 minutes, then rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **OGX Conditioner Hydration Coconut Water 385ml**:
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau
â­ Behentrimonium Chloride
â­ Cetearyl Alcohol
â­ Glycerin
â­ Cetyl Alcohol
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Cocos Nucifera (Coconut/Noix de Coco) Water
â­ Cocos Nucifera (Coconut/Noix de Coco) Oil
â­ Dimethiconol
â­ Glycol Distearate
â­ Glycol Stearate
â­ Ceteareth-20
â­ Tapioca Starch
â­ Isopropyl Alcohol
â­ Tetrasodium EDTA
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Benzyl Alcohol
â­ Parfum/Fragrance
â­ Benzyl Salicylate
â­ Limonene

description_en:
**OGX Conditioner Purifying Charcoal Detox 385ml** is a balanced blend that deeply cleanses your hair, removing build-up and leaving strands feeling light and refreshed. Infused with activated coconut charcoal and kaolin clay, **OGX Conditioner Purifying Charcoal Detox 385ml** gives dull hair a fresh clean and shiny glow. Even if you're a daily dry shampoo user, **OGX Conditioner Purifying Charcoal Detox 385ml** will leave your hair looking shiny and healthy. Nourish and purify your hair for a refreshed glow! **OGX Conditioner Purifying Charcoal Detox 385ml**, beauty pure and simple!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **OGX Conditioner Purifying Charcoal Detox 385ml**:
â­ After shampooing, distribute conditioner generously through wet hair from root to tip.
â­ Wait 3-5 minutes, then rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **OGX Conditioner Purifying Charcoal Detox 385ml**:
â­Aqua/Water/Eau, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Amodimethicone, Steareth-20, Charcoal Powder, Kaolin, Acrylates/Stearyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Polyquaternium-37, Polyquaternium-47, PPG-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, PPG-1 Trideceth-6, Glycol Distearate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Benzoate, Parfum/Fragrance, Limonene

**OGX Shampoo Purifying Charcoal Detox 385ml** is a balanced blend that gives your hair a deep clean detox by removing build-up, leaving your strands feeling light and refreshed. Infused with activated coconut charcoal and kaolin clay, **OGX Shampoo Purifying Charcoal Detox 385ml** cleanses congested tresses, leaving them with a fresh, shiny glow.  Even if you're a daily dry shampoo user, this shampoo will leave your hair looking shiny and healthy. Get a refreshed glow with **OGX Shampoo Purifying Charcoal Detox 385ml**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **OGX Shampoo Purifying Charcoal Detox 385ml**:
â­ Apply a generous amount to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage into a lather from roots to ends.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ For best results, follow with OGX conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **OGX Shampoo Purifying Charcoal Detox 385ml**:
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau

â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Charcoal Powder
â­ Kaolin
â­ and other ingredients

â­ Comb your hair before showering.

â­ Rinse with cold water.
â­ Pat your hair dry with a towel.
â­ Apply conditioner, leaving it on for 1-2 minutes.

description_en:
**Il Salone** Protein Straightening Kit With Linseed Oil: Easy, progressive, and gives perfectly straight hair. â­ Suitable for normal hair, lasting results up to 3 months. â­ Say goodbye to rebellious and damaged hair! â­ Linseed oil ensures seductive hair and an infusion of nourishment for a complete transformation of the hair fiber. â­ Gentle formula for long-lasting results. â­ Free from aldehydes, ammonia, parabens, paraffin, and ethyl alcohol.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Il Salone**:
â­ Ensure hair is clean and product-free.
â­ You will need a plastic bowl, brush, comb, hairdryer, hair straighteners, watch, and some hair clips. â­ Follow instructions carefully.
â­ (Step 1) Apply the disciplining shampoo, wash, rinse, repeat, and dry your hair.
â­ (Step 2) Wear gloves, apply the cream, distribute it on your hair (0.5 cm from the roots), comb, and leave in for 40 minutes.
â­ (Step 3) Apply the mask, leave in for 5 minutes, and rinse.
â­ (Step 4) Using a hairdryer, straighten sections of your hair (0.5 cm), 5-10 times per section.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Il Salone**:
â­ Milk proteins â­ Wheat proteins â­ Ceramides â­ Linseed oil

Reward your hair with a deep cleanse using the **Il Salone Shampoo And Conditioner Detox Kit**! Designed for all hair types, this kit detoxifies and protects hair fibers from pollutants.  A unique blend of active ingredients helps rebalance the scalp and hair. The shampoo deeply cleanses while the conditioner provides intense softness and hydration, helping to repair heat and product damage and detangling. Try the **Il Salone Shampoo And Conditioner Detox Kit** today!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Il Salone Shampoo And Conditioner Detox Kit**:
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly.
â­ Apply shampoo to scalp and massage gently.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly with water.
â­ Apply conditioner to ends of hair.
â­ Rinse with cool water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Il Salone Shampoo And Conditioner Detox Kit**:
â­ Vegetal charcoal: Absorbs impurities and pollutants from hair.
â­ Other active ingredients to rebalance scalp and hair.

description_en:
**Il Salone Plex Bond Rebuilder Booster Serum 4x15ml** is an ultra-concentrated serum for intensive repair and hair fiber reconstruction. It utilizes innovative PLEX REBUILDER TECHNOLOGY to protect hair from all types of damage. â­ Repairs and restores damaged hair. â­ Rebuilds broken bonds between fibers. â­ Strengthens hair by 93%. â­ Contains quinoa seed extract and more than 15 amino acids. â­ Suitable for all hair types. â­ Gives hair smoothness and shine. â­ Delivers professional results. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Il Salone Plex Bond Rebuilder Booster Serum 4x15ml**: â­ Use once a week. â­ Apply to damp hair after shampooing. â­ Leave on for 3-5 minutes (or 30 minutes for optimal results). â­ Rinse thoroughly. â­ Use with Il Salone Plex conditioner. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Il Salone Plex Bond Rebuilder Booster Serum 4x15ml**: â­ Quinoa seed extract. â­ More than 15 amino acids.

description_en:
**Il Salone Plex Bond Rebuilder Oil 100 Ml** is a powerful oil for intensive repair and hair fiber reconstruction using innovative Plex technology. â­ Repairs and rejuvenates damaged hair. â­ Contains quinoa seed extract and more than 15 amino acid proteins. â­ Restores broken bonds between fibers and strengthens hair by 93% more. â­ Protects hair from damage caused by chemical straightening, bleaching, coloring, and heat styling tools. â­ Suitable for all hair types. â­ Gives professional results. â­ Nourishes, softens, and adds shine. â­ Leaves hair looking healthy and vibrant. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Il Salone Plex Bond Rebuilder Oil 100 Ml**: 
â­ To soften long hair: Apply before shampooing, leave for a few minutes, then rinse. 
â­ To protect hair from heat: Apply before styling. 
â­ For intensive care: Massage a few drops into the hair from roots to ends, wrap in a towel, and leave overnight. Repeat weekly. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Il Salone Plex Bond Rebuilder Oil 100 Ml**: 
â­ Quinoa seed extract. 
â­ More than 15 amino acid proteins.

description_en:
**Il Salone Plex Bond Rebuilder Shampoo 250 Ml** is a luxurious shampoo designed to repair damaged hair and rebuild its fibers. â­ Gently cleanses and restores hair from the inside out. â­ Rebuilds broken bonds between hair fibers, making it up to 93% stronger. â­ Contains quinoa seed extract and more than 15 amino acid proteins to nourish and hydrate hair. â­ Protects hair from damage caused by environmental factors, heat tools, and chemical dyes. â­ Suitable for all hair types. â­ Gives hair shine, smoothness, and a silky touch. â­ Provides professional salon-like results. â­ Leaves hair healthy and vibrant. â­ Easy to use. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Il Salone Plex Bond Rebuilder Shampoo 250 Ml**: 
â­ Distribute the shampoo on damp hair. â­ Gently massage the scalp. â­ Rinse hair thoroughly with water. â­ Repeat if necessary.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Il Salone Plex Bond Rebuilder Shampoo 250 Ml**: 
â­ Quinoa seed extract. â­ More than 15 amino acid proteins. â­ Other ingredients specifically designed to repair and strengthen hair.

description_en:
**Il Salone Plex Bond Rebuilder Conditioner 250 Ml** is an intensive conditioner designed to repair and rebuild hair fibers using innovative Plex technology. â­ Moisturizes and rejuvenates damaged hair. â­ Contains quinoa seed extract and more than 15 amino acid proteins. â­ Rebuilds hair from the inside, strengthening it by up to 93%. â­ Protects hair from damage caused by chemical and environmental factors. â­ Suitable for all hair types. â­ Delivers professional results.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Il Salone Plex Bond Rebuilder Conditioner 250 Ml**: â­ Apply after Plex Rebuilder shampoo to lengths and ends. â­ Leave on for 2-3 minutes, then rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Il Salone Plex Bond Rebuilder Conditioner 250 Ml**: â­ Quinoa seed extract, â­ More than 15 amino acid proteins.

description_en:
**Il Salone Protein Cream For Normal Dry Hair 250 ml** is the perfect cream for dry and damaged hair. It gives your hair superior softness and attractive shine. Its rich formula of plant proteins, such as wheat and milk proteins, nourishes the hair from roots to ends, improving its elasticity and strength. Enjoy healthy and vibrant hair with **Il Salone Protein Cream For Normal Dry Hair 250 ml**. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Il Salone Protein Cream For Normal Dry Hair 250 ml**: 
â­ Wash your hair with shampoo. 
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of cream to your wet hair. 
â­ Distribute the cream evenly throughout your hair from roots to ends. 
â­ Leave it for 3-5 minutes. 
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Il Salone Protein Cream For Normal Dry Hair 250 ml**: 
â­ Milk proteins 
â­ Wheat proteins 
â­ Ceramides 
â­ Argan oil

title_ar: **Ø¢Ø±Ù… Ø§Ù†Ø¯ Ù‡Ø§Ù…Ø± Ø§Ù„ØªØ±Ø§ Ù…Ø§ÙƒØ³ Ù…Ø²ÙŠÙ„ Ø¹Ø±Ù‚ Ø¨Ø§ÙˆØ¯Ø± ÙØ±ÙŠØ´ 73 Ø¬Ø±Ø§Ù…**
description_en:
**Arm & Hammer Ultra Max Powder Fresh 73 Gm** offers all-day protection you can rely on. It decreases underarm perspiration and reduces sweat caused by stress. Provides long-lasting protection up to 48 hours.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Arm & Hammer Ultra Max Powder Fresh 73 Gm**:
â­ Apply a thin layer to underarms daily.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Arm & Hammer Ultra Max Powder Fresh 73 Gm**:
â­ Active ingredient: Aluminum Chlorohydrate (19%).
â­ Inactive ingredients: PPG-14 butyl ether, Cyclopentasiloxane, stearyl alcohol, c12-15 alkyl benzoate, talc, hydrogenated castor oil, petrolatum, fragrance, sodium bicarbonate (baking soda), corn starch-modified, polysaccharides, and maltodextrin.

For external use only. Do not apply to broken or irritated skin. If a rash or irritation develops, discontinue use. Keep out of reach of children.

description_en:
**Arm & Hammer** Complete Care Toothpaste provides complete oral care with the natural power of baking soda.

â­ Neutralizes harmful acids to protect enamel.
â­ Deep cleans between teeth and along the gumline for a thorough clean.
â­ Gently whitens teeth with the power of baking soda.
â­ Strengthens enamel and protects against cavities with fluoride.
â­ Helps control tartar buildup.
â­ Refreshing mint flavor.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Arm & Hammer**:
â­ Adults and children 2 years and older: Brush thoroughly for at least two minutes twice a day, or as directed by a dentist.
â­ Children under 7: Use a pea-sized amount and supervise brushing to minimize swallowing. Consult a dentist or doctor if a large amount is swallowed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Arm & Hammer**:
â­ Sorbitol, Water, Hydrated Silica, PEG-8, Sodium lauryl sulfate, Alcohol, Flavor, Cellulose gum, Sodium saccharin, Titanium dioxide, Sodium fluoride.

#toothpaste #armhammer #dentalcare #teethwhitening #oralcare #bakingsoda #fluoride #cavityprevention #oralhygiene #healthyteeth #KSA

**Arm & Hammer Charcoal White Toothpaste 75ml** for a brighter, whiter smile! â­ Gently removes surface impurities from tooth enamel. â­ Contains Active Calciumâ„¢ to rebuild and restore enamel, giving you twice the enamel strength. â­ Clinically proven whiter smile in 3 days with regular use.

description_en:
**Arm & Hammer** Brilliant Sparkle Toothpaste 115g, for a bright, confident smile! â­Naturally powered by baking soda for deep, effective cleaning. â­Neutralizes harmful acids before they damage teeth. â­Penetrates tiny crevices to clean away deep stains. â­Safely polishes with micro-polishers for whiter & brighter teeth. â­Helps maintain healthy gums. â­Fluoride cavity protection and enamel strengthening. â­Tartar control. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Arm & Hammer** Brilliant Sparkle Toothpaste â­Brush thoroughly for at least two minutes, twice a day. â­Children under 7: Use a pea-sized amount under adult supervision to minimize swallowing. â­Consult a dentist or doctor if a large amount is swallowed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Arm & Hammer** Brilliant Sparkle Toothpaste â­Aqua, Sodium Bicarbonate, Sorbitol, Hydrated Silica, Glycerin, Tetrasodium Pyrophosphate, Aroma, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Fluoride, Limonene, CI 77891

**Arm & Hammer Ultra Max Powder Fresh Deodorant 28g** provides maximum strength protection, even on your toughest days. Advanced Sweat Control Technology offers effective wetness protection for a fresh and clean scent you can rely on all day long.  **Arm & Hammer UltraMax** conquers any sweat challenge. description_en:
**Agadir Argan Hair Shampoo 366 ml**, a moisturizing and softening shampoo for dry and damaged hair, leaving your hair healthy and soft from the first use. Maintains hair dye, including light and silver colors. Suitable for hair treated with keratin or routine. A formula free of sulfates, parabens, and urea, and enhanced with biotin, keratin, and vitamin E, providing gentle and deep cleansing of the hair and scalp. Regular use helps get rid of hair dryness and frizz.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Agadir Argan Hair Shampoo 366 ml**:
â­ Apply a generous amount of **Agadir Argan Hair Shampoo 366 ml** to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage into a rich lather, and leave for one or two minutes.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly.
â­ It is recommended to use Agadir moisturizing conditioner for more smoothness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Agadir Argan Hair Shampoo 366 ml**:
â­ Natural argan oil
â­ Keratin
â­ Biotin
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Free of sulfates, parabens, urea, and salt (sodium chloride)

#Agadir #Shampoo #Argan #Hair #HairCare #Beauty #YourBeauty #HealthyHair #Moisturizing #Moroccan
