title_ar: **Ø£ØºØ§Ø¯ÙŠØ± Ø§Ø±ØºØ§Ù† Ø²ÙŠØª Ù„Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± 118 Ù…Ù„**
description_en:
**Agadir Argan Hair Treatment Oil 118 ml** is an argan oil hair treatment enhanced with keratin and biotin (Leave In). It treats and nourishes dull and damaged hair while maintaining its natural moisture. The non-greasy formula detangles hair, eliminates frizz, softens hair, adds shine, and improves hair health and growth. It helps detangle and comb hair, protects it from heat styling tools, and speeds up hair drying time.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Agadir Argan Hair Treatment Oil 118 ml**:
â­ Apply a small amount into the palms of your hands.
â­ Massage gently into damp hair and style.
â­ May apply a few drops to finished hair for added shine and protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Agadir Argan Hair Treatment Oil 118 ml**:
â­ Natural argan oil
â­ Keratin
â­ Biotin
â­ Vitamin E
Free of alcohol, sulfate, parabens, salt (sodium chloride), and urea.

description_en:
**Agadir Argan Hair Conditioner 366 ml** is a moisturizing and smoothing conditioner for dry and damaged hair. It gives you healthy and smooth hair from the first use, and maintains your hair color, even light and silver colors. Suitable for keratin-treated hair. Its formula is free of sulfates, parabens, and urea, and enriched with biotin, keratin, and vitamin E. It repairs dry and damaged hair, removes tangles, and treats split ends. It makes hair easy to style and leaves the distinct smell of Agadir after a shower.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Agadir Argan Hair Conditioner 366 ml**:
â­ Apply a generous amount of conditioner to the ends of your hair after shampooing.
â­ Massage and distribute evenly through wet hair.
â­ Leave it for one or two minutes.
â­ Rinse well.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Agadir Argan Hair Conditioner 366 ml**:
â­ Natural argan oil
â­ Keratin
â­ Biotin
â­ Vitamin E

description_en:
**Agadir Argan Oil Hair Volumizing Conditioner**, a moisturizing conditioner perfect for fine (smooth) and oily hair. Gives your hair health and shine from the first use. â­ Preserves the color of dyed hair, even light and silver colors. â­ Suitable for hair treated with keratin or protein. â­ Rich formula with biotin, keratin, panthenol and vitamin E, and free of sulfates, parabens, silicone, and urea. â­ Helps repair dry hair ends, eliminates tangles and frizz, and makes it easier to comb.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Agadir Argan Oil Hair Volumizing Conditioner**: 
â­ Apply a generous amount of **Agadir Argan Oil Hair Volumizing Conditioner** to the ends of your hair after shampooing. â­ Gently massage and distribute evenly through your wet hair. â­ Leave for one or two minutes. â­ Rinse well with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Agadir Argan Oil Hair Volumizing Conditioner**: 
â­ Natural argan oil â­ Keratin â­ Biotin â­ Vitamin E. â­ Free of sulfates, parabens, and urea.

#haircare #volumizingconditioner #agadir #arganoil #healthyhair #beauty #naturalingredients #shinyhair #hairmoisturizer #haircareroutine

description_en:
**Agadir Argan Moisture Masque** 236.6 ml, a luxurious hair mask packed with nourishing and restorative benefits. â­ Designed to deeply moisturize and repair damaged hair. â­ Leaves hair incredibly soft from roots to tips. â­ Protects against dust, dirt, and pollution. â­ Enriched with Argan oil, Hydrogenated Castor oil, Keratin protein, antioxidants, and Vitamin E. â­ Ideal for all hair types. â­ Repairs split ends and controls frizz. â­ Promotes hair growth and volume. â­ Suitable for men and women. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Agadir Argan Moisture Masque**: 
â­ Wash your hair with shampoo. â­ Gently towel dry. â­ Apply the mask evenly to your hair. â­ Comb through for even distribution. â­ Leave on for 3-5 minutes. â­ Rinse thoroughly. â­ Condition your hair. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Agadir Argan Moisture Masque**: 
â­ Keratin Protein. â­ Argan Oil. â­ Hydrogenated Castor Oil. â­ Silk Amino Acids. â­ Alcohol. â­ Vitamin E. â­ Antioxidants.

**Avalon-Avotin-A 0.05% W/W Cream 30 gm** is a 0.05% tretinoin cream for acne treatment. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Avalon-Avotin-A 0.05% W/W Cream 30 gm**: 
â­ Gently wash your skin 2-3 times daily, then pat dry. 
â­ Wait 20-30 minutes before applying the cream. 
â­ Apply a small amount to your fingertip and gently spread it over the affected area. 
â­ Use a non-comedogenic moisturizer with sunscreen in the morning. 
â­ Avoid contact with eyes and mouth. 
â­ Use as directed by your doctor.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Avalon-Avotin-A 0.05% W/W Cream 30 gm**: 
â­ Tretinoin 0.05% 
â­ Other ingredients (please see packaging for full list).

description_en:
**Avalon-Avocin 2% W/W Vaginal Cream 40 gm** is a unique formulation of Clindamycin Phosphate. â­ Used to treat symptoms of bacterial vaginosis in non-pregnant women. â­ Other pathogens associated with vulvovaginitis should be ruled out. â­ Presented in a 40 gm tube with a plastic applicator for ease of use. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Avalon-Avocin 2% W/W Vaginal Cream 40 gm**: 
â­ Wash your hands. â­ Open the tube. â­ Attach the applicator. â­ Squeeze the tube to dispense cream. â­ Ensure sufficient quantity. â­ Remove the applicator. â­ Lie on your back. â­ Gently insert the applicator. â­ Press the plunger. â­ Wash your hands. â­ If pregnant, insert gently. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Avalon-Avocin 2% W/W Vaginal Cream 40 gm**: 
â­ Clindamycin Phosphate.

â­ Apply generously and evenly over the face and body 20 minutes prior to sun exposure.

**Avene Dexeryl Cream 250 gm** effectively relieves itching and burning associated with various dermatoses such as eczema and atopic dermatitis. It absorbs quickly and provides deep hydration. Suitable for sensitive and dry skin, it's fragrance-free and paraben-free.

â­ For external use only.
â­ Apply a thin layer to affected areas twice daily or as needed.
â­ Close the tube tightly after use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Avene Dexeryl Cream 250 gm**:
â­ Glycerol
â­ White soft paraffin
â­ Liquid paraffin
â­ Silicone oil

**Avene Cream Xera Calm Lipid Replenishing 200 ml** is a rich moisturizing cream specifically designed to soothe and hydrate dry, sensitive skin prone to eczema and atopic dermatitis. It contains active ingredients that work to rebalance the skin's microbiome and boost the skin's natural defenses.  **Avene Cream Xera Calm Lipid Replenishing 200 ml** provides deep hydration that lasts up to 48 hours, with a formula free of fragrance, parabens, and preservatives.

â­ I-MODULIA Complex:

â­ AVENE Thermal Spring Water:
Soothes and softens the skin.

description_en:
**Avene Cicalfate+ Anti Scar Gel 30 ml** effectively helps reduce the appearance of scars within 3 weeks*, following surgical procedures such as post-caesarean section, post-orthopedic surgery, post-mastectomy, post-thyroidectomy, and post-cosmetic surgery.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Avene Cicalfate+ Anti Scar Gel 30 ml**:
â­ Apply twice daily.
â­ Gently massage onto the scar according to its age:
    â­ New scar (<1 month): Apply gently along the scar.
    â­ Scar in process of maturing: Massage in a circular motion for 3-5 minutes until absorption.
    â­ Mature scars (>3 months): Massage by gently stretching in two directions for 3-5 minutes until absorption.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Avene Cicalfate+ Anti Scar Gel 30 ml**:
â­ Innovative postbiotic repairing ingredient C+ Restore.
â­ Copper-Zinc Sulfate.
â­ Silicones.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid.
â­ AvÃ¨ne Thermal Spring Water.

**Avene Hyaluron Activ B3 Triple Correction Eye Care 15ml** is a comprehensive eye treatment specifically designed to fight the signs of aging. It contains a unique blend of dextran sulfate, pure hyaluronic acid, and niacinamide (6%) to act on the causes and signs of aging. The eye contour appears firmer, and wrinkles and dark circles appear smoother and brighter.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Avene Hyaluron Activ B3 Triple Correction Eye Care 15ml**:

Smoothness and luminosity are restored, and fine dehydration lines are minimized. It hydrates and daily protects the skin from UV rays, free radicals, and environmental pollution. description_en:
**Avene Hydrance Optimale SPF 30 Emulsion 40ml** is a lightweight moisturizer that provides long-lasting hydration and helps prevent water from evaporating from the skin, restoring smoothness, luminosity, and minimizing fine dehydration lines. It daily protects the skin from UV rays, free radicals, and environmental pollution. Its light, matte texture leaves the skin soft, supple, and radiant throughout the day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Avene Hydrance Optimale SPF 30 Emulsion 40ml**:
â­ Apply to cleansed facial skin alone or in combination with Hydrance Intense Serum.
â­ Avoid eyelids and the area around the eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Avene Hydrance Optimale SPF 30 Emulsion 40ml**:
â­ Cohederm (A patented lipidic trio that helps restore cohesive barrier and prevent water loss).
â­ Hydration Microspheres (Capture and store AvÃ¨ne Thermal Spring Water for time-released hydration).
â­ Avene Thermal Spring Water (Clinically shown to soothe, soften and calm the skin).

Safe for the entire family.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Avene Trixera Baume 200 ml**:
â­ Apply once or twice daily to severely dry areas of the face and body.
â­ For best results, use on skin cleansed with TriXÃ©ra Nutrition Nutri-Fluid Cleanser.

â­ Selectiose: Helps reinforce the skinâ€™s protective barrier by replenishing lipids.
â­ Lipid Trio: Ceramides, essential fatty acids, and plant sterols help restore the protective barrier and prevent moisture loss.
â­ Avene Thermal Spring Water: Clinically proven by 150 studies to soothe, soften, and calm the skin.

**Avene Sun Block Cream Intol SPF 50 Fragrance Free 50 ml** offers superior sun protection for sensitive skin.  This cream boasts 100% mineral sunscreen filters for broad-spectrum UV protection and soothing benefits. Its lightweight formula absorbs quickly without leaving any white residue.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Avene Sun Block Cream Intol SPF 50 Fragrance Free 50 ml**:
â­ Apply generously and evenly to face and neck 15 minutes before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply every 2 hours, or after 40 minutes of swimming or perspiring, or immediately after towel drying.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Avene Sun Block Cream Intol SPF 50 Fragrance Free 50 ml**:
â­ Zinc Oxide (100% mineral UV filter)
â­ Niacinamide
â­ Bisabolol + Alantoin
â­ Avene Thermal Spring Water

description_en:
**Avene Xeracalm Nutrition Balm 200ml** is a clinically proven balm that moisturizes and nourishes the skin for up to 48 hours. It helps restore the skin's protective barrier and soothes dryness, tightness, and scaling.  Its rich texture quickly replenishes lipids, providing intense hydration and a feeling of comfort and protection. **Avene Xeracalm Nutrition Balm** is free from fragrances, soap, parabens, sulfates, alcohol, silicones, and other harmful additives. It's eco-friendly and non-comedogenic.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Avene Xeracalm Nutrition Balm 200ml**:
â­ Apply a generous amount to clean, dry skin.
â­ Gently massage until fully absorbed.
â­ Use once or twice daily.
â­ For external use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Avene Xeracalm Nutrition Balm 200ml**:
â­ Avene Thermal Spring Water (Avene Aqua)
â­ Glycerin
â­ Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil
â­ Tetraisostearyl Citrate
â­ Polyglyceryl-2 Diisostearate
â­ Isopropyl Palmitate
â­ Niacinamide
â­ Behenyl Alcohol
â­ Benzoic Acid
â­ Caprylyl Glycol
â­ Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil
â­ Hydroxyethyl Cellulose
â­ Lauryl Glucoside
â­ Silybum Marianum Seed Oil
â­ Sodium Citrate
â­ Sodium Lauryl Glucose Carboxylate
â­ Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate
â­ Sorbic Acid
â­ Tocopherol
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Xanthan Gum

#Avene #Xeracalm #Moisturizer #Skincare #SkinHealth #Beauty #SaudiArabia #DrySkin #SensitiveSkin #FacialCare

**Avene Trixera Cleansing Gel 500 Ml + 100 Ml Free** is a gentle, moisturizing cleansing gel suitable for sensitive and very dry skin. Its rich formula with Selectiose, Glycerin, and Sorbitol gently cleanses and restores the skin's natural balance. Avene Thermal Water soothes and softens the skin. Ideal for daily use for the whole family, including infants and children. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Avene Trixera Cleansing Gel 500 Ml + 100 Ml Free**: 
â­ Apply an appropriate amount to wet skin. 
â­ Gently massage. 
â­ Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water. 
â­ Pat dry gently. 
â­ Use twice daily. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Avene Trixera Cleansing Gel 500 Ml + 100 Ml Free**: 
â­ Selectiose: Helps strengthen the skin's protective barrier. 
â­ Glycerin + Sorbitol: Moisturize and replenish lipids. 
â­ Avene Thermal Spring Water: Soothes and softens the skin.

description_en:
**Axe Deo Spray Ice Chill for Men 150 ml** is the miraculous men's body spray. â­ Instantly cools your skin. â­ Lowers body temperature by 6 degrees. â­ Provides 48-hour protection. â­ Fresh scent of frozen mint and lemon. â­ Aluminum-free deodorant. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Axe Deo Spray Ice Chill for Men 150 ml**: 
â­ Shake well before use. â­ Use from 15 cm away from the body. â­ For underarm use only. â­ Avoid direct inhalation. â­ Use in short bursts in well-ventilated areas. â­ Keep out of reach of children. â­ Do not use on irritated or broken skin. â­ Discontinue use if irritation occurs. â­ Do not pierce or burn the can. â­ Protect from sunlight and high temperatures.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Axe Deo Spray Ice Chill for Men 150 ml**: Alcohol denat., butane, isobutane, propane, parfum, alpha-isomethyl ionone, cinnamal, coumarin, hydroxycitronellal, limonene, linalool.

description_en:
**Accu-Chek Instant** Blood Glucose Test Strips provide an easy and accurate way to check your blood sugar levels from the comfort of your home.  This pack contains 50 individually wrapped, sanitized test strips for precise results.  **Accu-Chek Instant** is your reliable partner in diabetes management.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Accu-Chek Instant**: 
â­ Wash and thoroughly dry your hands.
â­ Remove a test strip from the container.
â­ Insert the strip into your glucometer (metallic end first).
â­ Apply a drop of blood to the yellow edge.
â­ Wait 4 seconds for results.
â­ Dispose of the strip in a medical waste bin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Accu-Chek Instant**: 
â­ Blood glucose test strips.

description_en:
**Accu-Chek Instant** Blood Glucose Monitoring System offers a simple and accurate way to test your blood sugar levels. â­ Get average blood glucose level readings. â­ Connect to your phone via Bluetooth and the MySugr app. â­ Color-coded display with an arrow indicating the range. â­ High accuracy that meets ISO 15197:2013 standards. â­ One-button navigation for readings and averages (7/30/90 days). â­ Easy-to-use Easy-Edge test strips. â­ Quick and easy setup. â­ Wireless data transfer to your smartphone or PC. â­ Accurate results in less than 4 seconds. â­ Long-lasting battery. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Accu-Chek Instant**: 
â­ Sanitize your hands. â­ Place the lancing device on your finger and press the button. â­ Gently squeeze your finger to get a blood drop. â­ Touch the yellow edge of the test strip to the blood drop. â­ Wait for the hourglass symbol to appear. â­ The result will appear with an arrow pointing to the range.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Accu-Chek Instant**: 
â­ Blood glucose meter. â­ Two boxes of test strips (50 strips per box). â­ 10 Accu-Chek SoftClix lancets. â­ Accu-Chek SoftClix lancing pen.

#bloodsugar #diabetes #health #AccuChek #bloodglucosemonitor #diabetescare #SaudiArabia #Saudihealth #glucose #AccuChekInstant

description_en:
**Accu-Chek Performa** Test Strips make testing your blood glucose quick and easy. â­ Ready to use right out of the box, no setup needed. â­ Compatible with **Accu-Chek Performa** blood glucose meter. â­ Tiny blood sample (0.6ÂµL). â­ Fast results in 5 seconds. â­ No coding required. â­ Set up to 4 pre- or post-meal reminders. â­ Auto-on when a test strip is inserted. â­ Auto-off to save energy. â­ Data storage up to 72 hours.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Accu-Chek Performa**: â­ Insert the strip into the meter. â­ Apply blood sample to the yellow window. â­ Results appear in 5 seconds.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Accu-Chek Performa**: â­ Blood glucose test strips.

description_en:
**Accu-Chek Active** Blood Glucose Test Strips provide accurate, fast, and easy results. â­ Smaller size than previous versions. â­ See test result averages for up to 90 days. â­ Alerts for expired strips or insufficient sample. â­ Re-dose within 10 seconds. â­ Pre- and post-meal reminders. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Accu-Chek Active**: 
â­ Insert the test strip. â­ Prick your finger to draw a blood drop. â­ Apply the blood drop to the green area of the strip. â­ Read the result. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Accu-Chek Active**: â­ Blood glucose test strips.

description_en:
**Accu-Chek Accu-Fine Pen Needles 4Mm 32G 100 Pcs** offer gentle, safe, and practical injections. â­ Compatible with most insulin pens. â­ Available in 4mm and 5mm lengths. â­ Special design for smooth insertion under the skin. â­ Protective coating for easy gliding. â­ Thin wall for rapid insulin flow. â­ Dual protection with two protective covers. â­ Easy screwing and unscrewing of the needle. â­ Sterile tip for safe use. â­ Suitable for everyone. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Accu-Chek Accu-Fine Pen Needles 4Mm 32G 100 Pcs**: â­ **Accu-Chek Accu-Fine Pen Needles 4Mm 32G 100 Pcs** can be injected at a 90Â° angle with one hand. â­ Counting to 10 during injection minimizes insulin leakage. â­ Change the needle after each use to avoid infections. â­ Do not inject over clothing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Accu-Chek Accu-Fine Pen Needles 4Mm 32G 100 Pcs**: â­ 100 sterile needles.

**Accu-Chek Sofclix Lancet 100 pcs** offers effortless blood sugar level monitoring. â­ Comfortable design with 11 depth settings for all skin types. â­ Sterile to prevent infection. â­ Easy and safe skin penetration with a beveled 28-gauge. â­ Portable, easy-to-use, and minimizes pain. â­ Suitable for type 1 and type 2 diabetics. â­ Helps you regularly monitor your sugar level. â­ Includes a user manual. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Accu-Chek Sofclix Lancet 100 pcs**: â­ Ensure clean hands. â­ Remove one lancet and protective cap. â­ Prick your finger and remove blood drops. â­ Place the blood drop on the strip. â­ Wait for the sugar level reading. â­ Discard the used lancet.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Accu-Chek Sofclix Lancet 100 pcs**: â­ 100 sterile lancets.

**Accu-Chek Softclix Lancet 200 pcs** for effortless blood sugar monitoring. â­ Comfortable design with 11 depth settings for all skin types. â­ Sterilized to prevent infection. â­ Smooth skin penetration with 28-gauge bevel. â­ Minimizes pain and skin damage. â­ Portable and easy to use. â­ Suitable for type 1 and type 2 diabetics. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Accu-Chek Softclix Lancet 200 pcs**: â­ Ensure clean hands. â­ Remove lancet cap. â­ Gently prick your finger. â­ Apply blood drop to strip. â­ Dispose of used lancet.

**Accu-Chek Guide** Blood Glucose Meter â€“ the smart, modern blood glucose meter! â­ Spill-resistant SmartPack test strip vial for easy, one-at-a-time strip removal. â­ Illuminated screen for clear readings in low light. â­ Test strip ejector button. â­ Accurate results in under 4 seconds. â­ High accuracy guaranteed by Roche. â­ Compatible with the mySugr app for wireless data transfer. â­ Easy to use. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Accu-Chek Guide**: â­ Wash and dry your hands. â­ Prepare the lancing device. â­ Check the expiration date on the test strip container. â­ Insert the test strip into the meter following the arrows. â­ When the blood drop symbol flashes, perform a finger prick and gently squeeze your finger.

description_en:
**Accu-Chek Accu-Fine Pen Needles (31g) x 5mm** provide gentle, safe, and practical injections. â­ Compatible with most insulin pens. â­ Special design for smooth, sub-cutaneous insertion. â­ Special coating for easy gliding. â­ Thin wall for rapid insulin flow. â­ Dual protection with two protective covers. â­ Easy screwing and unscrewing of the needle. â­ Sterile tip ensures safe use. â­ Compatible with all common insulin pens.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Accu-Chek Accu-Fine Pen Needles (31g) x 5mm**
â­ **Accu-Chek Accu-Fine Pen Needles (31g) x 5mm** can be injected into the skin with one hand at a 90Â° angle. â­ Counting to 10 during injection minimizes insulin leakage. â­ Change the needle after each use to avoid infection. â­ Do not inject insulin over clothing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Accu-Chek Accu-Fine Pen Needles (31g) x 5mm**
â­ Sterile needles made of high-quality medical-grade materials.

description_en:
**Accu-Chek Safe T Pro Uno 200 pcs** makes blood draws painless.  The package contains 200 lancing devices. â­ Lightweight and easy-to-use T-shaped lancing pen. â­ Cap on the tail end and a flat base on the other. â­ Sterile device with a sterile needle. â­ Pre-set depth of 1.5 mm. â­ Thin needle with a 3-facet cut, siliconized, 0.36 mm diameter. â­ Swift, precise, and painless blood draw. â­ Built-in safety mechanism for single use. â­ Safe disposal. â­ Suitable for all ages. â­ Compact and travel-friendly. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Accu-Chek Safe T Pro Uno**
â­ Sanitize hands with soap and water. â­ Remove the cap. â­ Hold the pen with index, middle, and thumb fingers. â­ Place and press the pen on your finger. â­ Press the release button. â­ Remove the pen. â­ Massage the area to form a blood drop. â­ Apply the drop to the test strip. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Accu-Chek Safe T Pro Uno**
â­ 200 sterile, single-use lancing devices. â­ Thin needle (0.36 mm) for maximum comfort. â­ Ergonomic design for ease of use. â­ Safety mechanism for single-use assurance. â­ Protective cap to maintain sterility.

**Accu-Chek Instant** blood glucose test strips offer a convenient and easy way to check your blood sugar at home. â­ Provides fast and accurate readings. â­ 100 strips (50*2) in an airtight container. â­ User-friendly and comfortable design. â­ Suitable for all age groups.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Accu-Chek Instant**: 
â­ Wash and dry your hands thoroughly. â­ Remove a test strip from the container. â­ Insert the strip into your glucometer. â­ Apply a drop of blood to the yellow edge. â­ Read the result on the screen within 4 seconds. â­ Dispose of the strip safely. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Accu-Chek Instant**: â­ Blood glucose test strips.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Anivagene**:

â­ Protects hair from pathogens and undesirable flora.

â­ For Dry & Damaged Hair

description_en:
**O'Keeffe'S Healty Feet Night Treatment Tube Cream 85g** is the perfect cream to rejuvenate your feet overnight. It absorbs quickly and helps moisturize and soothe dry, cracked skin. Wake up to soft, healthy-looking skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **O'Keeffe'S Healty Feet Night Treatment Tube Cream 85g**:
â­ Apply a small amount to your feet before bed.
â­ Gently massage until fully absorbed.
â­ Use daily for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **O'Keeffe'S Healty Feet Night Treatment Tube Cream 85g**:
â­Water
â­Glycerin
â­Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate
â­Cetyl Alcohol
â­Isopropyl Myristate
â­Hydrogenated Poly (C6-14 Olefin)
â­Dimethicone
â­Cetearyl Alcohol
â­Ceteareth-20
â­Beeswax
â­Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter
â­Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil
â­Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil
â­Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil
â­Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer
â­Panthenol
â­Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer
â­Polyquaternium-10
â­PEG-100 Stearate
â­Glyceryl Stearate
â­Disodium EDTA
â­Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate
â­Distearyldimonium Chloride
â­Dimethicone Crosspolymer
â­Laureth-23
â­Laureth-4
â­Propylene Glycol
â­Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate

description_en:
**O'Keeffe'S Healthy Feet Exfoliating Tube Cream** is the perfect cream for dry, cracked feet. It moisturizes, softens the skin, and restores its vitality and radiance. It absorbs quickly without leaving any greasy residue.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **O'Keeffe'S Healthy Feet Exfoliating Tube Cream**: 
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of cream to clean, dry feet.
â­ Gently massage until the cream is fully absorbed.
â­ Use as needed, daily or as often as required.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **O'Keeffe'S Healthy Feet Exfoliating Tube Cream**: 
â­ Water
â­ Glycerin
â­ Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate
â­ Urea
â­ Cetyl Alcohol
â­ Isopropyl Myristate
â­ Lactic Acid
â­ Hydrogenated Poly(C6-14 Olefin)

â­ Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate
â­ Diazolidinyl Urea

description_en:
**ISISPHARMA Neotone Body Intensive Body Milk 100ml** is an intense body milk with a depigmenting and moisturizing effect. It offers superficial peeling, suitable for sensitive areas (armpits, bikini line). Recommended for all types of hyperpigmentation (including acanthosis nigricans).

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **ISISPHARMA Neotone Body Intensive Body Milk 100ml**:
â­ Use daily and apply to areas where dark spots are present.
â­ Suitable for use in sensitive areas such as the underarms and bikini line.
â­ Can be used on your stomach after pregnancy to reduce linea nigra.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **ISISPHARMA Neotone Body Intensive Body Milk 100ml**:
â­ Exfoliating acids
â­ Shea butter

**Product Features:**
â­ Lightening and moisturizing lotion for all skin types and body areas, even sensitive skin and sensitive areas.
â­ High spreading and absorption power.
â­ Suitable for all family members.
â­ Offers intense hydration and a whitening effect after 14 days.

description_en:
**ISISPHARMA Neotone Intensive Serum 30ml** is a night serum extremely efficient in removing pigmentation spots. Its unique formula combines 6 powerful synergetic actives which reduce their intensity and contribute to their elimination. â­ Reduces the appearance of skin pigmentation. â­ Inhibits tyrosinase enzyme responsible for melanin synthesis. â­ Contains Glycolic and Salicylic acids for skin peeling to reduce pigmentation spots. â­ Fast absorbing. â­ Suitable for most skin types (except sensitive skin).

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **ISISPHARMA Neotone Intensive Serum 30ml**: â­ Use Neotone serum every night on visible dark spots. â­ During the treatment period, use suitable sun protection: Neotone Radiance SPF 50+ or a product from the Uveblock range with SPF 50+ on areas exposed to the sun.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **ISISPHARMA Neotone Intensive Serum 30ml**: â­ Lumi Skin â­ Liquorice â­ Niacinamide â­ Glycolic Acid â­ Salicylic Acid â­ Other active ingredients.

description_en:
**ISISPHARMA Neotone Eyes Eye Contour Roll-on 15ml** effectively reduces dark circles and puffiness around the eyes. â­Reduces vascular dark circles (blue/violet hues). â­Treats pigmented dark circles (brown/black hues). â­Reduces under-eye puffiness. â­Contains pure licorice extract for brightening. â­Combines active ingredients for deep hydration and effective removal of puffiness and dark circles. â­The roll-on applicator provides a cooling and decongesting effect.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **ISISPHARMA Neotone Eyes Eye Contour Roll-on 15ml**: â­Apply daily, morning and night, with gentle circular movements around the eye contour.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **ISISPHARMA Neotone Eyes Eye Contour Roll-on 15ml**: â­Pure licorice extract, â­other active ingredients for hydration and brightening.

#skincare #skinbrightening #darkcircles #beautyproducts #isispharma #eyecare #rollon #eyecontour #beauty #healthyskin
